SA15dhkprvku:460: ānantaryān na karma api sati tasminn asambhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:463: yāvad ātmani na premṇo hāniḥ sa paritasyati
SA15dhkprvku:464: tāvad duḥkhitam āropya na ca svastho avatiṣṭhate
SA15dhkprvku:473: mohaś ca mūlaṃ doṣāṇāṃ sa ca sattva-graho vinā
SA15dhkprvku:474: tena ādya-hetau na dveṣo na doṣo ataḥ kṛpā matā
SA15dhkprvku:476: akṣīṇa-śaktiḥ saṃskāro yeṣāṃ tiṣṭhanti te anaghāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:477: mandatvāt karuṇāyāś ca na yatnaḥ sthāpane mahān
SA15dhkprvku:478: tiṣṭhanty eva para-adhīnāḥ yeṣāṃ tu mahatī kṛpā
SA15dhkprvku:479: satkāyadṛṣṭer vigamād ādya eva abhavo bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:480: mārge cet sahaja-ahāner na hānau vā bhavaḥ kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:481: sukhī bhave ayaṃ duḥkhī vā mā bhūvam iti tṛṣyataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:482: yā eva aham iti dhīḥ sā eva sahajaṃ sattva-darśanam
SA15dhkprvku:483: na hy apaśyann aham iti snihyaty ātmani kaścana
SA15dhkprvku:484: na ca ātmani vinā premṇā sukha-kāmo abhidhāvati
SA15dhkprvku:485: duḥkha-utpādasya hetutvaṃ bandho nityasya tat kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:487: anityatvena yo avācyaḥ sa heturn na hi kasyacit
SA15dhkprvku:488: bandha-mokṣāv avācye api na vidyete kathaṃ ca na
SA15dhkprvku:489: nityaṃ tam āhur vidvāṃso yaḥ svabhāvo na naśyati
SA15dhkprvku:490: tyaktvā imāṃ hrepaṇīṃ dṛṣṭim ato nityaḥ sa ucyatām
SA15dhkprvku:491: ukto mārgasya tad abhyāsād āśrayaḥ parivartate
SA15dhkprvku:492: sātmye api doṣa-bhāvaś cen mārgavan na avibhutvataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:493: viṣaya-grahaṇaṃ dharmo vijñānasya yathā asti saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:494: gṛhyate so asya janako vidyamāna-ātmanā iti ca
SA15dhkprvku:495: eṣā prakṛtir asyās tan nimitta-antarataḥ skhalat
SA15dhkprvku:497: prabhāsvaram idaṃ cittaṃ prakṛtyā āgantavo malāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:498: tat-prāg apy asamarthānāṃ paścāc śaktiḥ kva tanmaye
SA15dhkprvku:499: na alaṃ praroḍhum atyantaṃ syandinyām agni-vad bhuvi
SA15dhkprvku:502: na bādhā yatnavattve api buddhes tat pakṣa-pātataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:504: rāga-pratighayor bādhā bhede api na parasparam
SA15dhkprvku:506: tan-mūlāś ca malāḥ sarve sa ca satkāyadarśanam
SA15dhkprvku:509: vyākhyeyo atra virodho yas tad-virodhāc ca tanmayaiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:514: sa ātmatvena anapāyatvād anekāntāc ca bhasma-vat
SA15dhkprvku:515: yaḥ paśyaty ātmānaṃ tatra aham iti śāśvataḥ snehaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:516: snehāt sukheṣu tṛṣyati tṛṣṇā doṣāṃs tiraskurute
SA15dhkprvku:517: guṇa-darśī paritṛṣyan mama iti tat sādhanāny upādatte
SA15dhkprvku:518: tena ātma-abhiniveśo yāvat tāvat sa saṃsāre
SA15dhkprvku:521: niyamena ātmani snihyaṃs tadīye na virajyate
SA15dhkprvku:522: na ca asty ātmani nirdoṣe sneha-apagama-kāraṇam
SA15dhkprvku:523: snehaḥ sadoṣa iti cet tataḥ kiṃ tasya varjanam
SA15dhkprvku:524: adūṣite asya viṣaye na śakyaṃ tasya varjanam
SA15dhkprvku:526: tayor adṛṣṭir viṣaye na tu bāhyeṣu yaḥ kramaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:527: na hi sneha-guṇāt snehaḥ kiṃ tv artha-guṇa-darśanāt
SA15dhkprvku:528: kāraṇe avikale tasmin kāryaṃ kena nivāryate
SA15dhkprvku:529: kā vā sadoṣatā dṛṣṭā snehe duḥkha-samāśrayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:530: tathā api na virāgo atra svatva-dṛṣṭer yathā ātmani
SA15dhkprvku:531: na tair vinā duḥkha-hetur ātmā cet te api tādṛśāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:532: nirdoṣaṃ dvayam apy evaṃ vairāgyaṃ na dvayos tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:534: ātmīya-buddhi-hānyā atra tyāgo na tu viparyaye
SA15dhkprvku:536: svatva-dhīḥ kena vāryeta vairāgyaṃ tatra tat kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:538: cyuteṣu sā ghṛṇā buddhir jāyate anyatra saspṛhā
SA15dhkprvku:540: sambandhaḥ sa tathā eva iti dṛṣṭāv api na hīyate
SA15dhkprvku:542: duḥkha-upakārān na bhaved aṅgulyām iva cet sva-dhīḥ
SA15dhkprvku:543: na hy ekāntena tad duḥkhaṃ bhūyasā saviṣa-anna-vat
SA15dhkprvku:548: yasya ātmā vallabhaḥ tasya sa nāśaṃ katham icchati
SA15dhkprvku:550: icchet prema kathaṃ premṇaḥ prakṛtir na hi tādṛśī
SA15dhkprvku:551: sarvathā ātma-grahaḥ sneham ātmani draḍhayaty alam
SA15dhkprvku:554: vṛttimān pratibadhnāti tad doṣān saṃvṛnoti ca
SA15dhkprvku:555: ātmany api virāgaś cet na idānīṃ yo virajyate
SA15dhkprvku:556: tyajaty asau yathā ātmānaṃ vyarthā ato duḥkha-bhāvanā
SA15dhkprvku:557: duḥkha-bhāvanayā apy eṣa duḥkham eva vibhāvayet
SA15dhkprvku:558: pratyakṣaṃ pūrvam api tat tathā api na virāgavān
SA15dhkprvku:559: yady apy ekatra doṣeṇa tat kṣaṇaṃ calitā matiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:560: viraktau na eva tatra api kāmi iva vanita-antare
SA15dhkprvku:561: tyājya-upādeya-bhede hi saktir yā eva eka-bhāvinī
SA15dhkprvku:564: etāvad eva ca jagat kva idānīṃ sa virajyate
SA15dhkprvku:565: sadoṣatā api cet tatra tasya tatra ātmany api sā samā
SA15dhkprvku:566: tatra aviraktas tad-doṣe kva idānīṃ sa virajyate
SA15dhkprvku:568: sa ca indriya-ādau na tv evaṃ bāla-āder api darśanāt
SA15dhkprvku:569: doṣavaty api sadbhāvāt svabhāvād guṇavaty api
SA15dhkprvku:571: tata eva ca na ātmīya-buddher api guṇa-īkṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:572: kāraṇaṃ hīyate sa api tasmān na aguṇa-darśanāt
SA15dhkprvku:573: api ca asad guṇa-āropaḥ snehāt tatra hi dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:574: tasmāt ta kāraṇā bādhī vidhis taṃ bādhate katham
SA15dhkprvku:576: indriya-ādeḥ pṛthag bhūtam ātmānaṃ vetty ayaṃ janaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:577: tasmān na ekatva-dṛṣṭyā api snehaḥ snihyan sa ātmani
SA15dhkprvku:579: pratyutpannā tu yo duḥkhān nirvedo dveṣa īdṛśaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:580: na vairāgyaṃ tadā apy asya sneho avasthā-antar eṣaṇāt
SA15dhkprvku:582: tasminn nivṛtte prakṛtiṃ svām eva bhajate punaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:586: sā ca naḥ pratyaya-utpattiḥ sā nairātmya-dṛg-āśrayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:588: anityāt prāha tena eva duḥkhaṃ duḥkhān nirātmatām
SA15dhkprvku:590: so amuktaḥ kleśa-karmabhyāṃ saṃsārī nāma tādṛśaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:591: ātmīyam eva yo na icched bhoktā apy asya na vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:592: ātmā api na tadā tasya kriyā-bhogau hi lakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:597: na alaṃ bīja-ādi-saṃsiddho vidhiḥ puṃsām ajanmane
SA15dhkprvku:599: prāg guror lāghavāt paścān na pāpa-haraṇaṃ kṛtam
SA15dhkprvku:600: mā bhūt gauravam eva asya na pāpaṃ gurv-amūrtitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:602: hīna-sthāna-gatir janma tena tacchin na jāyate
SA15dhkprvku:603: tayor eva hi sāmarthyaṃ jātau tan-mātra-bhavataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:604: te cetane svayaṃ karma ity akhaṇḍaṃ janma-kāraṇam
SA15dhkprvku:606: adṛṣṭa-nāśād agatis tat saṃskāro na cetanā
SA15dhkprvku:608: dṛṣṭaṃ buddhern na ca anyasya tāni santi na santi kim
SA15dhkprvku:610: na syus teṣām asāmarthye tasya dīkṣā-ādy-anantaram
SA15dhkprvku:611: atha buddhes tadā abhāvān na syuḥ sandhīyate malaiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:612: buddhes teṣām asāmarthye jīvato api syur akṣamāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:616: kriyāyām akriyāyāṃ ca kriyā ca sadṛśa-ātmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:617: aikyaṃ ca hetu-phalayor vyatireke tatas tayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:618: kartṛ-bhoktṛtva-hāniḥ syāt sāmarthyaṃ ca na sidhyati
SA15dhkprvku:620: asmṛteḥ kasyacit tena hy anubhūteḥ smṛta-udbhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:621: sthiraṃ sukhaṃ mama ahaṃ ca ity ādi satya-catuṣṭaye
SA15dhkprvku:624: hanti sā anucarāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ samyag-dṛṣṭiḥ subhāvitā
SA15dhkprvku:625: tri-hetorn na udbhavaḥ karma-dehayoḥ sthitayor api
SA15dhkprvku:626: eka-abhāvād vinā bījaṃ na aṅkurasya iva janmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:628: aśakyatvāc ca tṛṣṇāyāṃ sthitāyāṃ punar udbhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:629: dvaya-kṣaya-arthaṃ yatne ca vyarthaḥ karma-kṣaye śramaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:631: karmaṇāṃ tāpa-saṃkleśāt na eka-rūpāt tataḥ kṣayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:632: phalaṃ kathaṃcit taj-janyam alpaṃ syān na vijātimat
SA15dhkprvku:635: yadi iṣṭam aparaṃ kleśāt tat tapaḥ kleśa eva cet
SA15dhkprvku:636: tat karma-phalam ity asmān na śakteḥ saṃkara-ādikam
SA15dhkprvku:638: tajje karmaṇi śaktāḥ syuḥ kṛta-hāniḥ kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:639: doṣā na karmaṇo duṣṭaḥ karoti na viparyayāt
SA15dhkprvku:640: mithyā-vikalpena vinā na abhilāṣaḥ sukhād api
SA15dhkprvku:645: dayayā śreya ācaṣṭe jñānāt satyaṃ sasādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:646: tac ca abhiyogavān vaktuṃ yatas tasmāt pramāṇatā
SA15dhkprvku:649: prayoga-darśanād vā asya yat kiṃcid udaya-ātmakam
SA15dhkprvku:650: nirodha-dharmakaṃ sarvaṃ tad ity ādāv anekadhā
SA15dhkprvku:652: vyāpti-pradarśanād hetoḥ sādhyena uktaṃ ca tat sphuṭam
SA15dhkprvku:659: aśaktaṃ sarvam iti ced bīja-āder aṅkura-ādiṣu
SA15dhkprvku:660: dṛṣṭā śaktiḥ matā sā cet saṃvṛtyā astu yathā tathā
SA15dhkprvku:661: sā asti sarvatra ced buddher na anvaya-vyatirekayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:666: jñeyatvena grahād doṣo na abhāveṣu prasajyate
SA15dhkprvku:668: jñāna-rūpatayā arthatvāt keśa-ādi iti matiḥ punaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:676: sārūpyād bhrāntito vṛttir arthe cet syān na sarvadā
SA15dhkprvku:677: deśa-bhrāntiś ca na jñāne tulyam utpattito dhiyaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:684: ajñātasya svayaṃ jñānān nāma-ādy etena varṇitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:685: sā eva iṣṭa-arthavatī kena cakṣur-ādi-matir matā
SA15dhkprvku:688: atīta-anāgataṃ vācyaṃ na syād arthena tat kṣayāt
SA15dhkprvku:690: tan na kevala-sāmānya-agrahaṇād grahaṇe api vā
SA15dhkprvku:692: nityatvāc ca yadi vyaktir vyakteḥ pratyakṣatāṃ prati
SA15dhkprvku:693: ātmani jñāna-janane yac śaktaṃ śaktam eva tat
SA15dhkprvku:694: atha aśaktaṃ kadācic ced aśaktaṃ sarvadā eva tat
SA15dhkprvku:695: tasya śaktir aśaktir vā yā svabhāvena saṃsthitā
SA15dhkprvku:696: nityatvād acikitsyasya kas tāṃ kṣapayituṃ kṣamaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:698: nīla-ādy-ākāra-leśo yaḥ sa tasmin kena nirmitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:699: pratyakṣa-pratyaya-arthatvān na akṣāṇāṃ vyarthatā iti cet
SA15dhkprvku:700: sā eva eka-rūpāc śabda-āder bhinna-ābhāsā matiḥ kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:701: na jātir jātimad vyakti-rūpaṃ yena apara-āśrayam
SA15dhkprvku:702: siddhaṃ pṛthak cet kāryatvaṃ hy apekṣā ity abhidhīyate
SA15dhkprvku:705: anyatve tad asambaddhaṃ siddhā ato niḥsvabhāvatā
SA15dhkprvku:706: jāti-prasaṅgo abhāvasya na apekṣā abhāvatas tayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:709: tasyāṃ rūpa-avabhāso yas tattvena arthasya vā grahaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:712: yan niṣṭhās ta ime śabdā na rūpaṃ tasya kiṃcana
SA15dhkprvku:714: artha-bhrāntir api iṣyeta sāmānyaṃ sā apy abhiplavāt
SA15dhkprvku:715: artha-rūpatayā tattvena abhāvāc ca na rūpiṇī
SA15dhkprvku:717: yadi vastu na vastūnām avācyatvaṃ kathaṃcana
SA15dhkprvku:721: upacārāt tad iṣṭaṃ ced vartamāna-ghaṭasya kā
SA15dhkprvku:722: pratyāsattir abhāvena yā paṭa-ādau na vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:724: siṃhe māṇavake tadvad ghoṣaṇā apy asti laukikī
SA15dhkprvku:725: yatra rūḍhyā asad-artho api janaiḥ śabdo niveśitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:726: sa mukhyas tatra tat-sāmyād gauṇo anyatra skhalad gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:727: yathābhāve apy abhāva-ākhyāṃ yathā-kalpanam eva vā
SA15dhkprvku:728: kuryād aśakte śakte vā pradhāna-ādi-śrutiṃ janaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:729: śabdebhyo yādṛśī buddhir naṣṭe anaṣṭe api dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:730: tādṛśy eva sad-arthānāṃ na etac śrotṛ-ādi-cetasām
SA15dhkprvku:732: tasya api kevalasya prāg grahaṇaṃ vinivāritam
SA15dhkprvku:734: rūpaṃ dvirūpatāyāṃ vā tad-vastv ekaṃ kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:735: tābhyāṃ tad-anyad eva syād yadi rūpaṃ samaṃ tayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:736: tayor iti na sambandho vyāvṛttis tu na duṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:737: tasmāt samānatā eva asmin sāmānye avastu-lakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:738: kāryaṃ ca tad anekaṃ syān naśvaraṃ ca tan-matam
SA15dhkprvku:741: yac ca vastu-balāj jñānaṃ jāyate tad apekṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:742: na saṃketaṃ na sāmānya-buddhiṣv etad vibhāvyate
SA15dhkprvku:743: yā apy abheda-anugā buddhiḥ kācid vastu-dvaye kṣaṇe
SA15dhkprvku:746: jñāna-kāryeṣu jātir vā yayā anveti vibhāgataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:748: yadi nāma indriyāṇāṃ syād draṣṭā bhāseta tad-vapuḥ
SA15dhkprvku:750: vyakti-grahe ca tac śabda-rūpād anyan na dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:752: tad ayogyatayā arūpaṃ tad hy avastuṣu lakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:756: na ukta-uttaratvād dṛṣṭatvād atīta-ādiṣu ca anyathā
SA15dhkprvku:758: taj-jñānam ity adoṣo ayaṃ meyaṃ tv ekaṃ svalakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:762: gatiś cet pararūpeṇa na ca bhrānteḥ pramāṇatā
SA15dhkprvku:764: gatir apy anyathā dṛṣṭā pakṣaś ca ayaṃ kṛta-uttaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:770: tasya svatantraṃ grahaṇam ato anyad vastv atīndriyam
SA15dhkprvku:772: tad-āśrayeṇa sambandhī yadi syād gamakas tadā
SA15dhkprvku:774: tasmāt sarvaḥ parokṣo artho viśeṣeṇa na gamyate
SA15dhkprvku:775: yā ca sambandhino dharmād gatir dharmiṇi jāyate
SA15dhkprvku:776: sā anumānaṃ parokṣāṇām ekaṃ tena eva sādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:780: ekam eva aprameyatvād asataś cen mataṃ ca naḥ
SA15dhkprvku:782: tan niścaya-pramāṇaṃ vā dvitīyaṃ na akṣajā matiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:785: abhāve vinivṛttiś cet pratyakṣasya eva niścayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:786: viruddhaṃ sā eva vā liṅgam anvaya-vyatirekiṇī
SA15dhkprvku:790: na āśvāsa iti cel liṅgaṃ durdṛṣṭer atad īdṛśam
SA15dhkprvku:791: yataḥ kadācit siddhā asya pratītir vastunaḥ kvacit
SA15dhkprvku:792: tad avaśyaṃ tato jātaṃ tat svabhāvo api vā bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:793: sva-nimittaṃ svabhāvaṃ vā vinā na arthasya sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:794: yac ca rūpaṃ tayor dṛṣṭaṃ tad eva anyatra lakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:796: anyeṣu satsv adṛśye ca sattā vā tadvataḥ katham
SA15dhkprvku:799: tac ca na indriya-śakty-ādāv akṣa-buddher asambhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:802: vikalpena na sāmānya-grahas tasmiṃs tato anumā
SA15dhkprvku:804: pramāṇam anyat tad buddhir vinā liṅgena sambhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:806: tat pramāṇa-antaraṃ meya-bahutvād bahutā api vā
SA15dhkprvku:807: pramāṇānām anekasya vṛtter ekatra vā yathā
SA15dhkprvku:810: yojanād varṇa-sāmānye na ayaṃ doṣaḥ prasajyeta
SA15dhkprvku:811: na avastu rūpaṃ tasya eva tathā siddhe prasādhanāt
SA15dhkprvku:812: anyatra na anya-siddhiś cen na tasya eva prasiddhitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:813: yo hi bhāvo yathābhūto sa tādṛg liṅga-cetasaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:814: hetus tajjā tathābhūte tasmād vastuni liṅgi-dhīḥ
SA15dhkprvku:820: nimittaṃ tat svabhāvo vā kāraṇaṃ tac ca tad dhiyaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:822: siddhiṃ pramāṇair vadatām arthād eva viparyayāt
SA15dhkprvku:824: niṣedhe yā api tasya eva sā apramāṇatva-sūcanā
SA15dhkprvku:825: anyathā ekasya bhāvasya sadbhāva-uktyā parasya tat
SA15dhkprvku:826: na astitvaṃ kena gamyeta virodhāc ced asāv api
SA15dhkprvku:827: siddhaḥ kena asahasthānād iti cet tat kuto matam
SA15dhkprvku:828: dṛśyasya darśana-abhāvād iti cet sā apramāṇatā
SA15dhkprvku:829: tasmāt sva-śabdena uktā api sā abhāvasya prasādhikā
SA15dhkprvku:830: yasyā pramāṇaṃ sā avācyo niṣedhas tena sarvathā
SA15dhkprvku:832: prayogaḥ kevalaṃ bhinnaḥ sarvatra artho na bhidyate
SA15dhkprvku:833: viruddhaṃ tac ca sā upāyam avidhāyā api dhāya ca
SA15dhkprvku:834: pramāṇa-uktir niṣedhe yā na sā nyāyānusāriṇī
SA15dhkprvku:838: tādṛśo anupalabdheś ced ucyatāṃ sā eva sādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:841: bhinno abhinno api vā dharmaḥ sa viruddhaḥ prayujyate
SA15dhkprvku:842: yathā agnir ahime sādhye sattā vā janma-bādhanī
SA15dhkprvku:843: yathā vastv eva vastūnāṃ sādhane sādhanaṃ matam
SA15dhkprvku:844: tathā vastv eva vastūnāṃ sva-nivṛttau nivartakam
SA15dhkprvku:847: tatra api vyāpako dharmo nivṛtter gamako mataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:849: yad apramāṇatā abhāve liṅgaṃ tasya eva kathyate
SA15dhkprvku:852: tac ca hetau svabhāve vā adṛśye dṛśyatayā mate
SA15dhkprvku:853: anumānād anitya-āder grahaṇe ayaṃ kramo mataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:854: prāmāṇyam eva na anyatra gṛhīta-grahaṇān matam
SA15dhkprvku:855: na anyās yā anityatā bhāvāt pūrva-siddhaḥ sa ca indriyāt
SA15dhkprvku:856: na aneka-rūpo vācyo asau vācyo dharmo vikalpajaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:858: tad-asiddhau tathā asya eva hy anumānaṃ pravartate
SA15dhkprvku:868: buddhayo arthe pravartante abhinne bhinna-āśrayā iva
SA15dhkprvku:869: yathā-codanam ākhyāś ca so asati bhrānti-kāraṇe
SA15dhkprvku:871: siddho atra apy athavā dhvaṃso liṅgād anupalambhanāt
SA15dhkprvku:872: prāg bhūtvā hy abhavad bhāvo anitya ity abhidhīyate
SA15dhkprvku:874: anityatā śrutis tena tāvantāv iti kau smṛtau
SA15dhkprvku:875: prāk paścād apy abhāvaś cet sa eva anityatā na kim
SA15dhkprvku:876: ṣaṣṭhy-ādy-ayogād iti ced antayoḥ sa kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:878: aviśeṣaṇam eva syād antau cet kārya-kāraṇe
SA15dhkprvku:879: asambandhān na bhāvasya prāg-abhāvaṃ sa vāñchati
SA15dhkprvku:880: tad-upādhi-samākhyāne te apy asya ca na sidhyataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:882: sā sattā sa ca sambandho nityau kāryam atha iha kim
SA15dhkprvku:883: yasya abhāvaḥ kriyeta asau na bhāvaḥ prāg-abhāvavān
SA15dhkprvku:889: nidarśanaṃ tad eva iti sāmānya-agrahaṇaṃ yadi
SA15dhkprvku:890: nidarśanatvāt siddhasya pramāṇena asya kiṃ punaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:891: vismṛtatvād adoṣaś cet tad eva anidarśanam
SA15dhkprvku:895: sandhīyamānaṃ ca anyena vyavasāyaṃ smṛtiṃ viduḥ
SA15dhkprvku:896: tal-liṅga-apekṣaṇān no cet smṛtir na vyabhicārataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:900: sthito api cakṣuṣā rūpam īkṣate sā akṣajā matiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:901: punar vikalpayan kiṃcid āsīn me kalpanā īdṛśī
SA15dhkprvku:902: icchā ca iti na pūrva-ukta-avasthāyām indriyād gatau
SA15dhkprvku:903: ekatra dṛṣṭo bhedo hi kvacin na anyatra dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:904: na tasmāt bhinnam asty anyat sāmānyaṃ buddhy-abhedataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:905: tasmād viśeṣa-viṣayā sarvā eva indriyajā matiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:908: viṣayo yaś ca śabdānāṃ saṃyojyeta sa eva taiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:909: asya idam iti sambandhe yāv arthau pratibhāsinau
SA15dhkprvku:910: tayor eva hi sambandho na tadā indriya-gocaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:913: cakṣuṣo artha-avabhāse api yaṃ paro asya iti śaṃsati
SA15dhkprvku:914: sa eva yojyate śabdairn na khalv indriya-gocaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:918: vimūḍho laghuvṛtter vā tayor aikyaṃ vyayasyati
SA15dhkprvku:920: iti ced bhinna-jātīya-vikalpe anyasya vā katham
SA15dhkprvku:922: anyatra api samānaṃ tad varṇayor vā sakṛc śrutiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:923: sakṛt saṃgata-sarva-artheṣv indriyeṣv iha satsv api
SA15dhkprvku:924: pañcabhir vyavadhāne api bhāty avyavahita iva yā
SA15dhkprvku:926: vicchinna-ābhā iti tac citraṃ tasmāt santu sakṛd dhiyaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:928: śuddhe mano-vikalpe ca na krama-grahaṇam bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:929: yo agrahaḥ saṃgate apy arthe kvacid āsakta-cetasaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:930: saktyā anya-utpatti-vaiguṇyāc codyaṃ vā etad dvayor api
SA15dhkprvku:932: cakra-bhrāntiṃ dṛśā dhatte na dṛśāṃ ghaṭanena sā
SA15dhkprvku:934: āhur bālā vikalpe ca hetuṃ saṃketa-mandatām
SA15dhkprvku:935: teṣāṃ pratyakṣam eva syād bālānām avikalpanāt
SA15dhkprvku:936: saṃketa-upāya-vigamāt paścād api bhaven na saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:937: mano avyutpanna-saṃketam asti tena sa cen mataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:938: evam indriyaje api syād śeṣavac ca idam īdṛśam
SA15dhkprvku:939: yad eva sādhanaṃ bāle tad eva atra api kathyatām
SA15dhkprvku:941: viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ ca sambandhaṃ laukikīṃ sthitim
SA15dhkprvku:942: gṛhītvā saṃkalayya etat tathā pratyeti na anyathā
SA15dhkprvku:944: tadvatā yojanā na asti kalpanā apy atra na asty ataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:945: yady apy anvayi vijñānaṃ śabda-vyakty-avabhāsi tat
SA15dhkprvku:947: samānatve api tasya eva na īkṣaṇaṃ netra-gocaram
SA15dhkprvku:950: paṭas tantuṣv iha ity ādi-śabdāś ca ime svayaṃ kṛtāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:951: śṛṅgaṅ gavi iti loke syāc śṛṅge gaur ity alaukikam
SA15dhkprvku:953: tais tantubhir iyaṃ śāṭi ity uttaraṃ kāryam ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:956: tantv-ākhyāṃ vartayet kārye darśayan na āśrayaṃ śruteḥ
SA15dhkprvku:959: anumānaṃ ca jāty-ādau vastuno na asti bhedini
SA15dhkprvku:960: sarvatra vyapadeśo hi daṇḍa-āder api sāṃvṛtāt
SA15dhkprvku:962: geho yady api saṃyogas tan mālā kiṃ nu tad bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:963: jātiś ced geha eko api mālā ity ucyeta vṛkṣa-vat
SA15dhkprvku:964: mālā-bahutve tac śabdaḥ kathaṃ jāter ajātitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:965: mālā-ādau ca mahattva-ādir iṣṭo yaś ca aupacārikaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:968: padārtha-śabdaḥ kaṃ hetum anyaṃ ṣaṭkaṃ samīkṣate
SA15dhkprvku:969: yo yathā rūḍhitaḥ siddhas tat-sāmya-ādyas tathā ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:970: mukhyo gauṇaś ca bhāveṣv apy abhāvasya upacārataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:971: saṃketa-anvayinī rūḍhir vaktur icchā anvayī ca saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:974: bhede api yatra taj-jñānāt tat tathā pratipadyate
SA15dhkprvku:976: ity etat kārya-viśleṣasya anvayo na eka-vastunaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:977: vastūnāṃ vidyate tasmāt tan niṣṭhā vastuni śrutiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:981: vyatirekī iva yaj jñāne bhāty artha-pratibimbakam
SA15dhkprvku:982: śabdāt tad api na artha-ātmā bhrāntiḥ sā vāsanā-udbhavā
SA15dhkprvku:983: tasya abhidhāne śrutibhir arthe ko aṃśo avagamyate
SA15dhkprvku:984: tasya agatau ca saṃketa-kriyā vyarthā tad arthikā
SA15dhkprvku:985: śabdo artha-aṃśakam āha iti tatra anyāpoha ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:986: ākāraḥ sa ca na arthe asti tam vadann artha-bhāk katham
SA15dhkprvku:987: śabdasya anvayinaḥ kāryam arthena anvayinā sa ca
SA15dhkprvku:990: śabda-artho arthaḥ sa eva iti vacanena virudhyate
SA15dhkprvku:992: anuyānti imam artha-aṃśam iti vā apoha-kṛc śrutiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:996: śrutau sambadhyate apoho na etad vastuni yujyate
SA15dhkprvku:997: tasmāj jāty-ādi-tad-yogā na arthe teṣu ca na śrutiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1001: anyatra gata-citto api cakṣuṣā rūpam īkṣate
SA15dhkprvku:1002: tat saṃketa-agrahas tatra spaṣṭas tajjā ca kalpanā
SA15dhkprvku:1003: jāyante kalpanās tatra yatra śabdo niveśitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1004: tena icchātaḥ pravarteran na īkṣeran bāhyam akṣajāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1005: rūpaṃ rūpam iti īkṣeta tad dhiyaṃ kim iti īkṣate
SA15dhkprvku:1006: asti ca anubhavas tasyāḥ so avikalpaḥ kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1007: tasya eva anubhave dṛṣṭaṃ na vikalpa-dvayaṃ sakṛt
SA15dhkprvku:1009: smṛtir bhaved atīte ca sā agṛhīte kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1012: siddhaṃ tat kena tasmin hi na pratyakṣaṃ na laiṅgikam
SA15dhkprvku:1014: rūpa-ādir iva gṛhyeta na syāt tat pūrva-dhī-grahaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1017: sāmānya-vācinaḥ śabdās tad eka-arthā ca kalpanā
SA15dhkprvku:1019: asti cen nirvikalpaṃ ca kiṃcit tat-tulya-hetukam
SA15dhkprvku:1020: sarvan tathā eva hetor hi bhedād bhedaḥ phala-ātmanām
SA15dhkprvku:1022: tathā anapekṣya samayaṃ vastu-śaktyā eva netra-dhīḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1024: anapekṣya na cec śakyaṃ syāt smṛtāv eva liṅga-vat
SA15dhkprvku:1025: tasyās tat-saṃgama-utpatter akṣa-dhīḥ syāt smṛter na vā
SA15dhkprvku:1026: tataḥ kāla-antare api syāt kvacid vyākṣepa-sambhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:1027: krameṇa ubhaya-hetuś cet prāg eva syād abhedataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1028: anyo akṣa-buddhi-hetuś cet smṛtis tatra apy anarthikā
SA15dhkprvku:1030: bhedaś ca asamito grāhyaḥ smṛtis tatra kim arthikā
SA15dhkprvku:1032: tasmāc cakṣuś ca rūpāṃ ca pratītya udeti netra-dhīḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1033: sākṣāc cet jñāna-janane samartho viṣayo akṣa-vat
SA15dhkprvku:1034: atha kasmād dvaya-adhīna-janma tat tena na ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:1035: samīkṣya gamakatvaṃ hi vyapadeśo na gṛhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1036: tac ca akṣa-vyapadeśe asti tad-dharmaś ca niyojyatām
SA15dhkprvku:1039: saṃcitaḥ samudāyaḥ sāmānyaṃ tatra ca akṣa-dhīḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1042: uktās te saṃcitās te hi nimittāṃ jñāna-janmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1043: aṇūnāṃ sa viśeṣaś ca na antareṇa aparān aṇūn
SA15dhkprvku:1045: atha eka-āyatanatve api na anekaṃ dṛśyate sakṛt
SA15dhkprvku:1047: pratyuktaṃ lāghavaṃ ca atra teṣv eva krama-pātiṣu
SA15dhkprvku:1048: kim na akrama-grahas tulya-kālāḥ sarvāś ca buddhayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1049: kāścit tāsv akrama-ābhāsāḥ kramavatyo aparāś ca kim
SA15dhkprvku:1051: na ekaṃ citra-pataṃga-ādi rūpaṃ vā dṛśyate katham
SA15dhkprvku:1052: citraṃ tad ekam iti ced idaṃ citrataraṃ tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1053: na ekaṃ svabhāvaṃ citraṃ hi maṇi-rūpaṃ yathā eva tat
SA15dhkprvku:1055: tatra avayava-rūpaṃ cet kevalaṃ dṛśyate tathā
SA15dhkprvku:1056: nīla-ādīni nirasya anyac citraṃ citraṃ yad īkṣase
SA15dhkprvku:1058: nānā-arthā kramavatyā ekā kim eka-arthā akramā aparā
SA15dhkprvku:1060: tac ced anaṅgaṃ kena iyaṃ siddhā bheda-vyavasthitiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1062: arūpatvān na saṃyogaś citro bhakteś ca na āśrayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1065: nānā-arthā ekā bhavet tasmāt siddhānto apy avikalpikā
SA15dhkprvku:1066: vikalpayann apy eka-arthaṃ yato anyad api paśyati
SA15dhkprvku:1067: citra-avabhāseṣv artheṣu yady ekatvaṃ na yujyate
SA15dhkprvku:1068: sā eva tāvat kathaṃ buddhir ekā citra-avabhāsinī
SA15dhkprvku:1070: yathā yathārthāś cintyante viśīryante tathā tathā
SA15dhkprvku:1071: kiṃ syāt sā citratā ekasyāṃ na syāt tasyāṃ matāv api
SA15dhkprvku:1072: yadi idaṃ svayam arthānāṃ rocate tatra ke vayaṃ
SA15dhkprvku:1073: tasmān na artheṣu na jñāne sthūla-bhāsas tadātmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1074: ekatra pratiṣiddhatvād bahuṣv api na sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1075: paricchedo antar anyo ayaṃ bhāgo bahir iva sthitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1077: tatra ekasya apy abhāvena dvayam apy avahīyate
SA15dhkprvku:1078: tasmāt tad eva tasya api tattvaṃ yā dvaya-śūnyatā
SA15dhkprvku:1080: tad-upaplava-bhāve ca teṣāṃ bhedo apy upaplavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1084: lakṣaṇaṃ sa ca tattvaṃ na tena apy ete vilakṣaṇāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1092: aśakya-darśanas taṃ hi pataty arthe vivecayan
SA15dhkprvku:1093: yad yathā bhāsate jñānaṃ tat tathā eva prakāśate
SA15dhkprvku:1094: iti nāma eka-bhāvaḥ syāc citra-ākārasya cetasi
SA15dhkprvku:1096: vivekī na vivakṣā anyad avivekī ca na īkṣate
SA15dhkprvku:1097: ko vā virodho bahavaḥ saṃjāta-atiśayāḥ pṛthak
SA15dhkprvku:1098: bhaveyuḥ kāraṇaṃ buddher yadi na ātma-indriya-ādi-vat
SA15dhkprvku:1099: hetu-bhāvād ṛte na anyā grāhyatā nāma kācana
SA15dhkprvku:1100: tatra buddhir yad ābhāsā tasyās tad-grāhyam ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:1101: kathaṃ vā avayavī grāhyaḥ sakṛt sva-avayavaiḥ saha
SA15dhkprvku:1102: na hi go-pratyayo dṛṣṭaḥ sāsnā-ādīnām adarśane
SA15dhkprvku:1104: sampūrṇa-aṅgo na gṛhyeta sakṛn na api guṇa-ādimān
SA15dhkprvku:1106: yad aṅga-bhāvena upāttan tat tena eva hi gṛhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1108: agrahād bheda-buddhiḥ syāt paśyato apy aparāparam
SA15dhkprvku:1110: astu nāma tathā apy eṣāṃ bhavet sambandhi-saṃkaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1117: yady apy asti sitatva-ādir yādṛg indriya-gocaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1118: na so abhidhīyate śabdair jñānayo rūpa-bhedataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1119: eka-arthatve api buddhīnāṃ nānā-āśrayatā sa cet
SA15dhkprvku:1120: śrotṛ-ādi-cittāni idānīṃ bhinna-arthāni iti tat kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1121: jāto nāma āśrayo anyonyaḥ cetasāṃ tasya vastunaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1122: ekasya eva kuto rūpaṃ bhinna-ākāra-avabhāsi tat
SA15dhkprvku:1126: dṛśye gava-ādau jāty-ādes tad apy etena dūṣitam
SA15dhkprvku:1127: darśanāny eva bhinnāny apy ekāṃ kurvanti kalpanām
SA15dhkprvku:1131: kṣaṇikatvād atītasya darśane ca na sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1134: karmaṇy aindriyam anyad vā sādhanaṃ kim iti iṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:1135: sakṛd bhāvaś ca sarvāsāṃ dhiyāṃ tadbhāva-janmanām
SA15dhkprvku:1138: mano anyam eva gṛhṇāti viṣayaṃ na andhadṛk tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1140: tato anya-grahaṇe apy asya niyata-grāhyatā matā
SA15dhkprvku:1142: sahakāri bhaved artha iti ced akṣa-cetasaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1143: asataḥ prāg asāmarthyāt paścāc ca anupayogataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1144: prāgbhāvaḥ sarva-hetūnāṃ na ato arthaḥ sva-dhiyā saha
SA15dhkprvku:1145: bhinna-kālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyam iti ced grāhyatāṃ viduḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1147: kāryaṃ hy aneka-hetutve apy anukurvad udeti yat
SA15dhkprvku:1148: tat tena arpita-tad-rūpaṃ gṛhītam iti ca ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:1151: avedakāḥ parasya api te svarūpaṃ kathaṃ viduḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1155: sā arthe sati indriye yogye yathāsvam api cetasi
SA15dhkprvku:1156: dṛṣṭaṃ janma sukha-ādīnāṃ tat-tulyaṃ manasām api
SA15dhkprvku:1157: asatsu satsu ca eteṣu na janma-ajanma vā kvacit
SA15dhkprvku:1158: dṛṣṭaṃ sukha-āder buddher vā ta tato na anyataś ca te
SA15dhkprvku:1161: yasya arthasya nipātena te jātā dhī-sukha-ādayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1162: taṃ muktvā pratipadyeta sukha-ādīn eva sā katham
SA15dhkprvku:1164: tal-lāghavāc cet tat-tulyam ity asaṃvedanaṃ na kim
SA15dhkprvku:1165: na ca ekayā dvaya-jñānaṃ niyamād akṣa-cetasaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1166: sukha-ādy-abhāve apy arthāc ca jāteḥ tac śakty-asiddhitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1167: pṛthak pṛthak ca sāmarthye dvayor nīla-ādi-vat sukham
SA15dhkprvku:1169: na hi saṃvedanaṃ yuktam arthena eva saha-grahe
SA15dhkprvku:1170: kiṃ sāmarthyaṃ sukha-ādīnāṃ na iṣṭā dhīr yat tad udbhavā
SA15dhkprvku:1172: rūpa-ādiḥ stry-ādi-bhedo akṣaṇā na gṛhyeta kadācana
SA15dhkprvku:1173: na hi saty antaraṅge arthe śakter dhīr bāhya-darśanī
SA15dhkprvku:1177: saty āntare apy upādāne jñāne duḥkha-ādi-sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1178: na upādānaṃ viruddhasya tac ca ekam iti cen matam
SA15dhkprvku:1180: ādhipatyaṃ tu kurvīta tad-viruddhe api dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:1184: vedakāḥ svātmanaś ca eṣām arthebhyo janma kevalam
SA15dhkprvku:1185: artha-ātmā svātmabhūto hi teṣāṃ tair anubhūyate
SA15dhkprvku:1187: kaścid bahiḥ sthitān eva sukha-ādīn apracetanān
SA15dhkprvku:1188: grāhyān āha na tasya api sakṛd yukto dvaya-grahaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1190: bhinna-avabhāsinor grāhyaṃ cetasos tad abhedi kim
SA15dhkprvku:1192: tāratamyaṃ ca buddhau syān na prīti-paritāpayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1194: sa idānīṃ kathaṃ bāhyaḥ sukha-ādy-ātmā iti gamyate
SA15dhkprvku:1196: agrāhakaḥ syāt sarvasya tato hīyeta bhoktṛtā
SA15dhkprvku:1198: grāhyagrāhakatā-abhāvād bhāve anyatra api sā bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1199: tasmāt ta āntarā eva saṃvedyatvāc ca cetanāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1200: saṃvedanaṃ na yad rūpaṃ na hi tat tasya vedanam
SA15dhkprvku:1201: atat-svabhāvo anubhavo bauddhāṃs tān samavaiti cet
SA15dhkprvku:1202: muktvā adhyakṣa-smṛta-ākārāṃ saṃvittiṃ buddhir atra kā
SA15dhkprvku:1204: ekam āvirbhavad dṛṣṭaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ tv anyad antarā
SA15dhkprvku:1207: abhinna-vedanasya aikye yan na evaṃ tad-vibheda-vat
SA15dhkprvku:1208: sidhyed asādhanatve asya na siddhaṃ bheda-sādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:1210: abhinna-ābhe vibhinne ced bheda-abhedau kim āśrayau
SA15dhkprvku:1213: prāguktaṃ yogināṃ jñānaṃ teṣāṃ tad bhāvanām ayam
SA15dhkprvku:1216: abhūtān api paśyanti purato avasthitān iva
SA15dhkprvku:1218: svapne api smaryate smārtaṃ ca tat tādṛg arthavat
SA15dhkprvku:1221: tasmād bhūtam abhūtaṃ vā yad yad eva abhibhāvyate
SA15dhkprvku:1223: tatra pramāṇaṃ saṃvādi yat prāṅ nirṇīta-vastu-vat
SA15dhkprvku:1225: śabda-artha-grāhi yad yatra taj-jñānaṃ tatra kalpanā
SA15dhkprvku:1226: svarūpaṃ ca na śabda-arthas tatra adhyakṣam ato akhilam
SA15dhkprvku:1236: na pratyayo anuyaṃs tac ca pratyakṣāt parihīyate
SA15dhkprvku:1237: apavādaś caturtho atra tena uktam upaghātajam
SA15dhkprvku:1239: mānasaṃ tad api ity eke teṣāṃ grantho virudhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1240: nīla-dvi-candra-ādi-dhiyāṃ hetur akṣāṇy api ity ayam
SA15dhkprvku:1243: kiṃ vā aindriyaṃ yad akṣāṇāṃ bhāva-abhāva-anurodhi cet
SA15dhkprvku:1244: tat-tulyaṃ vikriyā-vac cet sā iva iyaṃ kiṃ niṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1245: sarpa-ādi-bhrānti-vac ca asyāḥ syād akṣa-vikṛtāv api
SA15dhkprvku:1246: nivṛttir na nivarteta nivṛtte apy akṣa-viplave
SA15dhkprvku:1247: kadācid anya-santāne tathā eva apy eta vācakaiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1249: suptasya jāgrato vā api yā eva dhīḥ sphuṭa-bhāsinī
SA15dhkprvku:1250: sā nirvikalpa-ubhayathā apy anyathā eva vikalpikā
SA15dhkprvku:1251: tasmāt tasya avikalpe api prāmāṇyaṃ pratiṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1252: visaṃvādāt tad-arthaṃ ca pratyakṣa-ābhaṃ dvidhā uditam
SA15dhkprvku:1253: kriyā-sādhanam ity eva sarvaṃ sarvasya karmaṇaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1254: sādhanaṃ na hi tat tasyāḥ sādhanaṃ yā kriyā yataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1256: bhāvyaṃ tena ātmanā yena pratikarma vibhajyate
SA15dhkprvku:1257: anātmabhūto bhedo asya vidyamāno api hetuṣu
SA15dhkprvku:1258: bhinne karmaṇy abhinnasya na bhedena niyāmakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1259: tasmād yato asya ātma-bhedo asya adhigatir ity ayam
SA15dhkprvku:1261: arthena ghaṭayaty enāṃ na hi muktvā artha-rūpatām
SA15dhkprvku:1262: anyaḥ sva-bhedāj jñānasya bhedako api kathaṃcana
SA15dhkprvku:1265: sā ca tasya ātmabhūtā eva tena na artha-antaraṃ phalam
SA15dhkprvku:1266: dadhānaṃ tac ca tām ātmany artha-adhigamana-ātmanā
SA15dhkprvku:1272: na iṣṭaṃ prāmāṇyam eteṣāṃ vyavadhānāt kriyāṃ prati
SA15dhkprvku:1273: sarveṣām upayoge api kārakāṇāṃ kriyāṃ prati
SA15dhkprvku:1274: yad antyaṃ bhedakaṃ tasyās tat-sādhakatamaṃ matam
SA15dhkprvku:1276: tad-bhede api hy abhinnasya tasya idam iti tat kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1278: atādrūpye na bhedo api tadvad anya-dhiyo api vā
SA15dhkprvku:1279: na iṣṭo viṣaya-bhedo api kriyā-sādhanayor dvayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1280: eka-arthatve dvayaṃ vyarthaṃ na ca syāt krama-bhāvitā
SA15dhkprvku:1283: sarva-ātmanā api sambaddhaṃ kaiścid eva avagamyate
SA15dhkprvku:1284: dharmaiḥ sa niyamo na syāt sambandhasya aviśeṣataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1285: tad abhede api bhedo ayaṃ yasmāt tasya pramāṇatā
SA15dhkprvku:1286: saṃskārāc ced atādrūpye na tasya apy avyavasthiteḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1291: kā artha saṃvid yad eva idaṃ pratyakṣaṃ prativedanam
SA15dhkprvku:1293: atha so anubhavaḥ kva asya tad eva idaṃ vicāryate
SA15dhkprvku:1294: sarūpavanti tat kena sthūla-ābhāsaś ca te aṇavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1299: idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vedam iti yatra avasāya-dhīḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1300: sa tasya anubhavaḥ sā eva pratyāsattir vicāryate
SA15dhkprvku:1302: tayoḥ sambandham āśritya draṣṭur eṣa viniścayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1303: ātmā sa tasya anubhavaḥ sa ca na anyasya kasyacit
SA15dhkprvku:1305: na anyo anubhāvyas tena asti tasya na anubhavo paraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1306: tasya api tulya-codyatvāt svayaṃ sā eva prakāśate
SA15dhkprvku:1307: nīla-ādi-rūpas tasya asau svabhāvo anubhavaś ca saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1310: yathā prakāśo abhimatas tathā dhīr ātma-vedinī
SA15dhkprvku:1311: tasyāś ca artha-antare vedye durghaṭau vedya-vedakau
SA15dhkprvku:1316: tadā anya-saṃvido abhāvāt svasaṃvit phalam iṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:1317: yadi bāhyo anubhūyeta ko doṣo na eva kaścana
SA15dhkprvku:1318: idam eva kim uktaṃ syāt sa bāhyo artho anubhūyeta
SA15dhkprvku:1319: yadi buddhis tad-ākārā sā asty ākāra-niveśinī
SA15dhkprvku:1320: sā bāhyād anyato vā iti vicāram idam arhati
SA15dhkprvku:1322: darśanaṃ nīla-nirbhāsaṃ na artho bāhyo asti kevalaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1325: tasmād dvi-rūpam asty ekaṃ yad evam anubhūyate
SA15dhkprvku:1326: smaryate ca ubhaya-ākārasya asya saṃvedanaṃ phalam
SA15dhkprvku:1327: yadā niṣpanna-tadbhāva iṣṭo aniṣṭo api vā paraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1328: vijñapti-hetur viṣayas tasyāś ca anubhavas tathā
SA15dhkprvku:1330: tadā ya ātma-anubhavaḥ sa eva artha-viniścayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1331: yadi iṣṭa-ākāra ātmā syād anyathā vā anubhūyate
SA15dhkprvku:1332: iṣṭo aniṣṭo api vā tena bhavaty arthaḥ praveditaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1333: vidyamāne api bāhya-arthe yathānubhavam eva saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1335: yadi bāhyaṃ na vidyeta kasya saṃvedanaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1336: yady agatyā svarūpasya bāhyasya eva na kiṃ matam
SA15dhkprvku:1337: abhyupāye api bhedena na syād anubhavo dvayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1338: adṛṣṭa-āvaraṇān no cen na nāma-artha-vaśā gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1340: tad adṛṣṭaṃ kathaṃ nāma bhaved arthasya vedakam
SA15dhkprvku:1342: aniṣṭa-ādāv asandhānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tatra api cetasām
SA15dhkprvku:1343: tasmāt prameye bāhye api yuktaṃ sva-anubhavaḥ phalam
SA15dhkprvku:1344: yataḥ svabhāvo asya yathā tathā eva artha-viniścayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1345: tadā artha-ābhāsatā eva asya pramāṇaṃ na tu sann api
SA15dhkprvku:1347: yasmād yathā niviṣṭo asāv artha-ātmā pratyaye tathā
SA15dhkprvku:1348: niścīyate niviṣṭo asāv evam ity ātma-saṃvidaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1349: ity artha-saṃvit sā eva iṣṭā yato artha-ātmā na dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:1350: tasyā buddhi-niveśya-arthaḥ sādhanaṃ tasya sā kriyā
SA15dhkprvku:1351: yathā niviśate so arthaḥ tathā hi sa prakāśate
SA15dhkprvku:1352: artha-sthites tadātmatvāt svavid apy arthavin matā
SA15dhkprvku:1353: tasmād viṣaya-bhedo api na svasaṃvedanaṃ phalam
SA15dhkprvku:1355: tathā avabhāsamānasya tādṛśo anya-adṛśo api vā
SA15dhkprvku:1356: jñānasya hetur artho api ity arthasya iṣṭā prameyatā
SA15dhkprvku:1357: yathā kathaṃcin na asya artha-rūpaṃ yuktyā avabhāsinaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1363: dūre yathā vā maruṣu mahān alpo api dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:1367: satyaṃ kathaṃ syur ākārās tad ekatvasya hānitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1368: anyasya anyatva-hāneś ca na abhedo arūpa-darśanāt
SA15dhkprvku:1369: rūpa-abhedaṃ hi paśyantī dhīr abhedaṃ vyavasyati
SA15dhkprvku:1370: bhāvā yena nirūpyante tad-rūpaṃ na asti tattvataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1371: yasmād ekam anekaṃ vā rūpaṃ teṣāṃ na vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:1374: adarśanāj jagat yasminn ekasya api tadātmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1375: asti iyam api yā tv antar upaplava-samudbhavā
SA15dhkprvku:1379: tādātmyād ātmavit tasya sa tasyā sādhanaṃ tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1382: tatra apy anubhava-ātmatvāt te yogyāḥ svātmasaṃvidi
SA15dhkprvku:1383: iti sā yogyatā mānam ātmā meyaḥ phalaṃ svavit
SA15dhkprvku:1385: sā yogyatā iti ca proktaṃ pramāṇaṃ svātmavedanam
SA15dhkprvku:1386: sarvam eva hi vijñānaṃ viṣayebhyaḥ samudbhavat
SA15dhkprvku:1387: tad-anyasya api hetutve kathaṃ syād viṣaya-ākṛtiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1389: pitros tad ekasya ākāraṃ dhatte na anyasya kasyacit
SA15dhkprvku:1391: viṣayatvaṃ tad-aṅgena tad-abhāve na tad bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1395: sā vā anityā na jātiḥ syān nityā vā janikā katham
SA15dhkprvku:1396: nāma-ādikaṃ niṣiddhaṃ prāṅ na ayam arthavatāṃ kramaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1398: smṛtiś ca īdṛgvidhaṃ jñānaṃ tasyāś ca anubhavād bhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1399: sa ca artha-ākāra-rahitaḥ sā idānīṃ tadvatī katham
SA15dhkprvku:1400: na arthād bhāvas tadā abhāvāt syāt tathā anubhave api saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1401: ākāraḥ sa ca na arthasya spaṣṭa-ākāra-vivekataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1402: vyatiriktaṃ tam ākāraṃ pratīyād aparas tathā
SA15dhkprvku:1403: nityam ātmani sambandhe pratīyāt kathitaṃ ca na
SA15dhkprvku:1404: ekā ekena abhisambandhe pratisandhir na yujyate
SA15dhkprvku:1407: bhinna-ātma-arthaḥ kathaṃ grāhyas tadā syād dhīr anarthikā
SA15dhkprvku:1410: anyathā hy atad-ākāraṃ kathaṃ jñāne adhirohati
SA15dhkprvku:1411: eka-ākāra-uttaraṃ jñānaṃ tathā hy uttaram uttaram
SA15dhkprvku:1412: tasya artha-rūpeṇa ākārāv ātma-ākāraś ca kaścana
SA15dhkprvku:1415: bhrāntyā saṅkalanaṃ jyotir manaskāre ca sā bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1416: sarveṣām api kāryāṇāṃ kāraṇaiḥ syāt tathā grahaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1419: sārūpyāt tat kim anyat syād dṛṣṭeś ca yamala-ādiṣu
SA15dhkprvku:1424: anyathā hy ādyam eva ekaṃ saṃyojyeta artha-sambhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:1427: viṣayasya tato anyatvaṃ kena ākāreṇa sidhyati
SA15dhkprvku:1428: bhedaś ca bhrānti-vijñānair dṛśyeta indāv iva advaye
SA15dhkprvku:1430: na artho asaṃvedanaḥ kaścid anarthasya api vedanam
SA15dhkprvku:1431: dṛṣṭaṃ saṃvedyamānaṃ tat tayor na asti vivekitā
SA15dhkprvku:1434: abhāvād akṣa-buddhīnāṃ satsv apy anyeṣu hetuṣu
SA15dhkprvku:1435: niyamaṃ yadi na brūyāt pratyayāt samanantarāt
SA15dhkprvku:1439: buddhir āśritya kalpyeta yadi kiṃ vā virudhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1440: anagni-janyo dhūmaḥ syāt tat-kāryāt kāraṇe agatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1441: na syāt kāraṇatāyāṃ vā kuta ekāntato gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1443: gamayed agni-nirbhāsāṃ dhiyam eva na pāvakam
SA15dhkprvku:1445: vyanakti citta-santāno dhiyaṃ dhūmo agnitas tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1446: asty eṣa viduṣāṃ vādo bāhyaṃ tv āśritya varṇyate
SA15dhkprvku:1451: sarvaṃ tad-artham arthāc cet tasya na asti tad-ābhatā
SA15dhkprvku:1453: tasya kenacid aṃśena parato api bhidā bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1454: tathā hy āśritya pitaraṃ tad-rūpo api sutaḥ pituḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1459: bhūtaṃ paśyaṃś ca tad-darśī kathaṃ ca upahata-indriyaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1460: śodhitaṃ timireṇa asya vyaktaṃ cakṣur atīndriyam
SA15dhkprvku:1461: paśyato anya-akṣa-dṛśye arthe tad-avyaktaṃ kathaṃ punaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1463: śaktir hetus tato na anyo ahetuś ca viṣayaḥ katham
SA15dhkprvku:1464: sa eva yadi dhī-hetuḥ kiṃ pradīpam apekṣate
SA15dhkprvku:1465: dīpa-mātreṇa sadbhāvād ubhayaṃ na api kāraṇam
SA15dhkprvku:1467: tat syād āloka-bhedāc cet tat pidhāna-apidhānayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1468: tulyā dṛṣṭir adṛṣṭir vā sūkṣmo aṃśas tasya kaścana
SA15dhkprvku:1469: ālokena na mandena dṛśyate ato bhidā yadi
SA15dhkprvku:1473: bhinne anyasminn abhinnasya kuto bhedena bhāsanam
SA15dhkprvku:1474: mandaṃ tad api tejaḥ kim āvṛtter iha sā na kim
SA15dhkprvku:1475: tanutvāt tejaso apy etad asty anyatra apy atānavam
SA15dhkprvku:1476: atyāsanne ca suvyaktaṃ tejas tat syād atisphuṭam
SA15dhkprvku:1477: tatra apy adṛṣṭam āśritya bhaved rūpa-antaraṃ yadi
SA15dhkprvku:1478: anyonya-āvaraṇāt teṣāṃ syāt tejo vihatis tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1479: tatra ekam eva dṛśyeta tasya anāvaraṇe sakṛt
SA15dhkprvku:1480: paśyet sphuṭa-asphuṭaṃ rūpam eko adṛṣṭena vāraṇe
SA15dhkprvku:1481: artha-anarthau na yena stas tad-adṛṣṭaṃ karoti kim
SA15dhkprvku:1486: vyaktiḥ kuto asatāṃ jñānād anyasya anupakāriṇaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1487: vyaktau vyajyeta sarvo arthas tad-hetor niyamo yadi
SA15dhkprvku:1488: na eṣā api kalpanā jñāne jñānaṃ tv artha-avabhāsataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1489: taṃ vyanakti iti kathyeta tad-abhāve api tat-kṛtam
SA15dhkprvku:1490: na ākārayati ca anyo artho anupakārāt saha-uditaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1491: vyakto na ākārayan jñānaṃ sva-ākāreṇa kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1492: vajra-upala-ādir apy arthaḥ sthiraḥ so anya-anapekṣaṇāt
SA15dhkprvku:1493: sakṛt sarvasya janayej jñānāni jagataḥ samam
SA15dhkprvku:1495: āhuḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ bhedaṃ sa doṣo atra api pūrvavat
SA15dhkprvku:1496: saṃvedanasya tādātmye na vivādo asti kasyacit
SA15dhkprvku:1497: tasya artha-rūpatā siddhā sā api sidhyati saṃsmṛteḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1499: evam etan na khalv evam iti sā syān na bhedinī
SA15dhkprvku:1500: na ca anubhava-mātreṇa kaścid bhedo vivecakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1501: vivekinī na ca aspaṣṭa-bhede dhīr yamala-ādi-vat
SA15dhkprvku:1504: dhiyā atadrūpayā jñāne niruddhe anubhavaḥ kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1505: svaṃ ca rūpaṃ na sā vetti ity utsanno anubhavo arthinaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1506: bahir mukhaṃ ca taj-jñānaṃ bhāty artha-pratibhāsa-vat
SA15dhkprvku:1507: buddheś ca grāhikā buddhir nityam antarmukhā-ātmani
SA15dhkprvku:1508: yo yasya viṣaya-ābhāsas taṃ vetti na tad ity api
SA15dhkprvku:1509: prāptā kā saṃvid anyā asti tādrūpyād iti cen matam
SA15dhkprvku:1511: buddhiḥ sarūpā tad-vic cet na idānīṃ vit-sarūpikā
SA15dhkprvku:1512: svayaṃ so anubhavas tasyā na sa sārūpya-kāraṇaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1516: dhiyo nīla-ādi-rūpatve bāhyo arthaḥ kiṃ pramāṇakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1517: dhiyo anīla-ādi-rūpatve sa tasya anubhavaḥ katham
SA15dhkprvku:1519: siddhaṃ tat svata eva asya kim arthena upanīyate
SA15dhkprvku:1520: sarvātmanā hi sārūpye jñānam ajñānatāṃ vrajet
SA15dhkprvku:1521: sāmye kenacid aṅgena syāt sarvaṃ sarva-vedanam
SA15dhkprvku:1523: tathā anubhava-rūpatvāt tasya apy anubhavo bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1524: na anubhūto anubhava ity artha-vat tad-viniścayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1525: tasmād adoṣa iti cet na arthe apy asty eṣa sarvadā
SA15dhkprvku:1526: kasmād vā anubhave na asti sati sattā-nibandhane
SA15dhkprvku:1527: api ca idaṃ yad ābhāti dṛśyamāne sita-ādike
SA15dhkprvku:1529: tat kiṃ sita-ādy-abhivyakteḥ pararūpam atha ātmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1530: pararūpe aprakāśāyāṃ vyaktau vyaktaṃ kathaṃ sitam
SA15dhkprvku:1531: jñānaṃ vyaktir na sā vyaktā ity avyaktam akhilaṃ jagat
SA15dhkprvku:1533: dṛṣṭyā ca ajñāta-sambandhaṃ viśinaṣṭi tayā katham
SA15dhkprvku:1534: yasmād dvayor eka-gatau na dvitīyasya darśanam
SA15dhkprvku:1535: dvayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭayor dṛṣṭau syād dṛṣṭam iti niścayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1536: sarūpaṃ darśanaṃ yasya dṛśyate anyena cetasā
SA15dhkprvku:1537: dṛṣṭa-ākhyā tatra cet siddhaṃ sārūpye asya svavedanam
SA15dhkprvku:1538: atha ātma-rūpan no vetti pararūpasya vit katham
SA15dhkprvku:1539: sārūpyād vedanā-ākhyā ca prāg eva pratipāditā
SA15dhkprvku:1540: dṛṣṭayor eva sārūpya-graho arthaṃ ca na dṛṣṭavān
SA15dhkprvku:1541: prāk kathaṃ darśanena asya sārūpyaṃ so adhyavasyati
SA15dhkprvku:1542: sārūpyam api na icched yaḥ tasya na ubhaya-darśanam
SA15dhkprvku:1543: tadā artho jñānam iti ca jñāte ca iti gatā kathā
SA15dhkprvku:1544: atha svarūpaṃ sā tarhi svayam eva prakāśate
SA15dhkprvku:1545: yat tasyām aprakāśāyām arthaḥ syād aprakāśitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1547: apratyakṣāṃ dhiyaṃ prāhus te api nirvarṇita-uttarāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1550: pratyakṣās tad-viviktaṃ ca na anyat kiṃcid vibhāvyate
SA15dhkprvku:1551: yat taj-jñānam paro apy enāṃ bhuñjīta anyena vid yadi
SA15dhkprvku:1552: tajjā tat pratibhāsā vā yadi dhīr vetti na aparā
SA15dhkprvku:1553: ālambamānasya anyasya apy asty avaśyam idaṃ dvayam
SA15dhkprvku:1554: atha na utpadyate tasmān na ca tat pratibhāsinī
SA15dhkprvku:1555: sā dhīrn nirviṣayā prāptā sāmānyaṃ ca tad-agrahe
SA15dhkprvku:1556: na gṛhyata iti proktaṃ na ca tad-vastu kiṃcana
SA15dhkprvku:1557: tasmād artha-avabhāso asau na anyas tasyā dhiyas tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1559: na adhyakṣam iti ced eṣa kuto bhedaḥ samarthayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1561: sarvathā anyo na gṛhṇīyāt saṃvid bhedo apy apoditaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1562: yeṣāṃ ca yogino anyasya pratyakṣeṇa sukha-ādikam
SA15dhkprvku:1563: vidanti tulya-anubhavās tadvat te api syur āturāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1565: na udeti duḥkham iti cet na vai duḥkha-samudbhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1568: bhāsamānaṃ svarūpeṇa pīḍā duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ yadā
SA15dhkprvku:1569: na tad-ālambanaṃ jñānaṃ na tadā evaṃ prayujyate
SA15dhkprvku:1571: artha-sārūpyam ālamba ātmā vittiḥ svayaṃ sphuṭaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1572: api ca adhyakṣatā abhāve dhiyaḥ syāl liṅgato gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1573: tac ca akṣam artho dhīḥ pūrvo manaskāro api vā bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1576: tathā artho dhī-manaskārau jñānaṃ tau ca na sidhyataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1577: na aprasiddhasya liṅgatvaṃ vyaktir arthasya cen matā
SA15dhkprvku:1578: liṅgaṃ sā eva nanu jñānaṃ vyakto artho anena varṇitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1580: atha arthasya eva kaścit sa viśeṣo vyaktir iṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:1582: tad iṣṭau vā pratijñānaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ prasajyate
SA15dhkprvku:1583: sa ca jñāto athavā ajñāto bhavej jñātasya liṅgatā
SA15dhkprvku:1584: yadi jñāte aparicchinne jñāto asāv iti tat kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1585: jñātatvena aparicchinnam api tad gamakaṃ katham
SA15dhkprvku:1586: adṛṣṭa-dṛṣṭayo anyena draṣṭā dṛṣṭā na hi kvacit
SA15dhkprvku:1587: viśeṣaḥ so anya-dṛṣṭāv apy asti iti syāt sva-dhī-gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1589: kevalān na artha-dharmāt kaḥ sva-dharmaḥ sva-dhiyo paraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1591: tasya bhedaḥ kuto buddher vyabhicāry-anyajaś ca saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1593: muktvā na kāryam aparaṃ tasyāḥ samupalabhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1594: tatra atyakṣaṃ dvayaṃ pañcasv artheṣv eko api na īkṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:1596: yad evam apratītaṃ tal liṅgam ity apy alaukikam
SA15dhkprvku:1597: vidyamāne api liṅge tāṃ tena sārdham apaśyataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1598: kathaṃ pratīti-liṅgaṃ hi na adṛṣṭasya prakāśakam
SA15dhkprvku:1599: tata eva asya liṅgāt prāk prasiddher upavarṇane
SA15dhkprvku:1601: ity arthasya dhiyaḥ siddhiḥ na arthāt tasyāḥ kathaṃcana
SA15dhkprvku:1603: pratyakṣāṃ ca dhiyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyāś ca iṣṭa-abhidhā-ādikam
SA15dhkprvku:1604: para-citta-anumānaṃ ca na syād ātmany adarśanāt
SA15dhkprvku:1606: prakāśitā kathaṃ vā syāt buddhir buddhy-antareṇa vaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1609: sa ca prakāśas tad-rūpaḥ svayam eva prakāśate
SA15dhkprvku:1610: tathā abhyupagame buddheḥ buddhau buddhiḥ svavedikā
SA15dhkprvku:1611: siddhā anyathā tulya-dharmā viṣayo api dhiyā saha
SA15dhkprvku:1612: iti prakāśa-rūpā naḥ svayaṃ dhīḥ samprakāśate
SA15dhkprvku:1614: sādṛśye api hi dhīr anyā prakāśyā na tayā matā
SA15dhkprvku:1619: tasmād yato ayaṃ tasya api vācyam anyasya darśanam
SA15dhkprvku:1620: smṛter apy ātmavit siddhā jñānasya anyena vedane
SA15dhkprvku:1623: varṇaḥ syād akramo dīrghaḥ kramavān akramāṃ katham
SA15dhkprvku:1625: akrameṇa grahād anta-krama-vad dhīś ca no bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1626: āntyaṃ pūrva-sthitād ūrdhvaṃ vardhamāno dhvanir bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1627: sthāne svayaṃ na naśyet sā paścād apy aviśeṣataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1629: sakṛd yatna-udbhavād vyarthaḥ syād yatnaś ca uttarottaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1630: vyaktāv apy eṣa varṇānāṃ doṣaḥ samanuṣajyate
SA15dhkprvku:1631: anekayā tad-grahaṇe yā antyā dhīḥ sā anubhūyate
SA15dhkprvku:1632: na dīrgha-grāhikā sā ca tan na syād dīrgha-dhī-smṛtiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1633: pṛthak pṛthak ca buddhīnāṃ saṃvittau tad-dhvaniḥ śruteḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1634: avicchinna-ābhatā na syād ghaṭanaṃ ca nirākṛtam
SA15dhkprvku:1635: vicchinnaṃ śṛṇvato apy asya yady avicchinna-vibhramaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1641: eka-aṇv-atyaya-kālaś ca kālo alpīyān kṣaṇo mataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1642: buddhiś ca kṣaṇikā tasmāt kramād varṇān prapadyate
SA15dhkprvku:1644: vicchinnā apy anyayā buddhiḥ sarvā syād vitatha-arthikā
SA15dhkprvku:1645: ghaṭanaṃ yac ca bhāvānām anyatra indriya-vibhramāt
SA15dhkprvku:1648: na akṣa-grāhye asti śabdānāṃ yojanā iti vivecitam
SA15dhkprvku:1649: vicchinnaṃ paśyato apy akṣair ghaṭayed yadi kalpanā
SA15dhkprvku:1650: arthasya tat saṃvitteś ca satataṃ bhāsamānayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1651: bādhake asati san nyāye vicchinna iti tat kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1652: buddhīnāṃ śakti-niyamād iti cet sa kuto mataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1653: yugapad buddhy-adṛṣṭeś cet tad eva idaṃ vicāryate
SA15dhkprvku:1655: tathā hi samyak lakṣyante vikalpāḥ krama-bhāvinaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1657: spaṣṭa-avabhāsāaṃ pratyakṣāṃ kalpayet so api vāritaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1659: pratīta-bhede apy adhyakṣā dhīḥ kathaṃ tādṛśī bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1662: sa eva ayam iti jñānaṃ na asti tac ca akṣaje kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1663: na ca artha-jñāna-saṃvittyor yugapat sambhavo yataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1664: lakṣyate pratibhāsau dvau na artha-artha-jñānayoḥ pṛthak
SA15dhkprvku:1665: na hy artha-ābhāsi ca jñānam artho bāhyaś ca kevalaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1667: sūpalakṣyeṇa bhedena yau saṃvittau na lakṣitau
SA15dhkprvku:1668: artha-artha-pratyayau paścāt smaryete tau pṛthak katham
SA15dhkprvku:1672: na hi saṃvedanaṃ śuddhaṃ bhaved arthasya vedanam
SA15dhkprvku:1673: tathā hi nīla-ādy-ākāra eka ekaṃ ca vedanam
SA15dhkprvku:1674: lakṣyate na tu nīla-ābhe vedane vedanaṃ param
SA15dhkprvku:1675: jñāna-antareṇa anubhavo bhavet tatra api ca smṛtiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1676: dṛṣṭā tad-vedanaṃ kena tasya apy anyena ced imām
SA15dhkprvku:1677: mālāṃ jñāna-vidāṃ ko ayaṃ janayaty anubandhinīm
SA15dhkprvku:1678: pūrvā dhīḥ sā eva cen na syāt saṃcāro viṣaya-antare
SA15dhkprvku:1680: agṛhītvā uttaraṃ jñānaṃ gṛhṇīyād aparaṃ katham
SA15dhkprvku:1681: ātmani jñāna-janane svabhāve niyatāṃ ca tām
SA15dhkprvku:1682: ko nāma anyo vibadhnīyād bahir-aṅge antaraṅgikām
SA15dhkprvku:1683: bāhyaḥ saṃnihito apy arthaḥ tāṃ vibandhuṃ hi na prabhuḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1684: dhiyaṃ na anubhavet kaścid anyathā arthasya saṃnidhau
SA15dhkprvku:1685: na ca saṃnihita-arthā asti daśā kācid ato dhiyaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1686: utsanna-mūlā smṛtir apy utsannā ity ujjvalaṃ matam
SA15dhkprvku:1690: viṣaya-antara-saṃcāro yadi sā eva artha-dhīḥ kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1691: śakti-kṣaye pūrva-dhiyaḥ na hi dhīḥ prāg dhiyā vinā
SA15dhkprvku:1695: na apekṣeta anyathā sāmyaṃ mano-vṛtter mano antaram
SA15dhkprvku:1697: ekatvān manaso anyasmin saktasya anya-agater yadi
SA15dhkprvku:1699: samavṛttau ca tulyatvāt sarvadā anya-agatir bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1700: janma ca ātma-mano yoga-mātrajānāṃ sakṛd bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1701: ekā eva cet kriyā ekaḥ syāt kiṃ dīpo aneka-darśanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1702: krameṇa api na śaktaṃ syāt paścād apy aviśeṣataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1703: anena deha puruṣāv uktau saṃskārato yadi
SA15dhkprvku:1704: niyamaḥ sa kutaḥ paścād buddheś ced astu sammatam
SA15dhkprvku:1705: na grāhyatā anyā jananāj jananaṃ grāhya-lakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:1706: agrāhyaṃ na hi tejo asti na ca saukṣmya-ādy-anaṃśake
SA15dhkprvku:1708: grāhyatāyā na khalv anyaj jananaṃ grāhya-lakṣaṇe
SA15dhkprvku:1709: sākṣān na hy anyathā buddhe rūpa-ādir upakārakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1711: buddher api tad asti iti sā api tattve vyavasthitā
SA15dhkprvku:1713: rūpa-ādeś cetasaś ca evam aviśuddha-dhiyaṃ prati
SA15dhkprvku:1716: rūpa-ādi-buddheḥ kiṃ jātaṃ paścād yat prāṅ na vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:1717: sati sva-dhī-grahe tasmāt sā eva anantara-hetutā
SA15dhkprvku:1718: cetaso grāhyatā sā eva tato na artha-antarā gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1720: prakṛtyā eva iti gaditaṃ nānā-ekasmān na ced bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1721: na kiṃcid ekam ekasmāt sāmagryāḥ sarva-sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1722: ekaṃ syād api sāmagrayor ity uktaṃ tad anekakṛt
SA15dhkprvku:1723: arthaṃ pūrvaṃ ca vijñānaṃ gṛhṇīyād yadi dhīḥ parā
SA15dhkprvku:1726: dvir dvir ekaṃ ca bhāseta bhāsanād ātma-tad-vidoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1729: ātma-anubhūtaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na anubhūtaṃ parair yadi
SA15dhkprvku:1730: ātma-anubhūtiḥ sā siddhā kṛto yena evam ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:1731: vyakti-hetv-aprasiddhiḥ syān na vyakter vyaktam icchataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1732: vyakty-asiddhāv api vyaktaṃ yadi vyaktam idaṃ jagat
SA15dhkprvku:1733: parasya pratipādyatvād adṛṣṭo api svayaṃ paraiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1734: dṛṣṭaḥ sādhanam ity eke tat-kṣepāya ātma-dṛg-vacaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1736: vācaḥ prāmāṇyam asmin hi na anumānaṃ pravartate
SA15dhkprvku:1737: bādhanāya āgamasya ukteḥ sādhanasya paraṃ prati
SA15dhkprvku:1738: so apramāṇaṃ tadā asiddhaṃ tat-siddham akhilaṃ tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1739: tad-āgamavataḥ siddhaṃ yadi kasya ka āgamaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1740: bādhyamānaḥ pramāṇena sa siddhaḥ katham āgamaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1741: tad-viruddha-abhyupagamas tena eva ca kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1743: tat kasmāt sādhanaṃ na uktaṃ sva-pratītir yad udbhavā
SA15dhkprvku:1744: yuktyā yayā āgamo grāhyo grāhikā asya api sā na kim
SA15dhkprvku:1746: sādhanaiḥ sādhanāny artha-śakti-jñāne asya tāny alam
SA15dhkprvku:1747: vicchinna-anugamā ye ca sāmānyena apy agocarāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1748: sādhya-sādhana-cintā asti na teṣv artheṣu kācana
SA15dhkprvku:1751: sann artho jñāna-sāpekṣo na asan jñānena sādhakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1752: sato api vastv-asaṃśliṣṭā asaṃgatyā sadṛśī gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1753: liṅgaṃ svabhāvaḥ kāryaṃ vā dṛśya-adarśanam eva vā
SA15dhkprvku:1754: sambaddhaṃ vastutaḥ siddhaṃ tad asiddhaṃ kim ātmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1755: pareṇa apy anyato gantum ayuktaṃ para-kalpitaiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1760: vastunaś ca anyathā abhāvāt kalpitā vyabhicāriṇaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1762: na arthe tena tayorn na asti svataḥ sādhana-saṃsthitiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1764: pramāṇaṃ saṃśaya-utpatteḥ tataḥ sākṣān na sādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:1765: sādhyasya eva abhidhānena pāraṃparyeṇa na apy alam
SA15dhkprvku:1766: śaktasya sūcakaṃ hetu-vaco aśaktam api svayam
SA15dhkprvku:1768: śaktis tasya api ced hetu-vacanasya pravartanāt
SA15dhkprvku:1770: vipakṣa-upagame apy etat tulyam ity anavasthitiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1771: antaraṅgaṃ tu sāmarthyaṃ triṣu rūpeṣu saṃsthitam
SA15dhkprvku:1774: viṣaya-khyāpanād eva siddhau cet tasya śaktatā
SA15dhkprvku:1775: vyāpti-pūrve vinā apy asmāt kṛtakaḥ śabda īdṛśaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1776: sarve anityā iti prokte apy arthāt tan nāśa-dhīr bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1778: triṣv anyatam arūpasya eva anuktir nyūnatā uditā
SA15dhkprvku:1779: sādhya-uktiṃ vā pratijñāṃ sa vadan doṣair na yujyate
SA15dhkprvku:1783: siddha-ukteḥ sādhanatvāc cet parasya api na duṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:1786: asambaddhā tathā hy eṣa na nyāya iti sūcitam
SA15dhkprvku:1790: anukto api icchayā vyāptaḥ sādhya ātma-artha-van mataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1792: vṛttau svayaṃ śruteḥ prāha kṛtā ca eṣā tad-arthikā
SA15dhkprvku:1794: anuktāv api vāñchāyā bhavet prakaraṇād gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1795: ananvayo api dṛṣṭānte doṣas tasya yathoditaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1796: ātmā paraś cet so asiddha iti tatra iṣṭa-ghātakṛt
SA15dhkprvku:1797: sādhanaṃ yad vivāde na nyastaṃ tac cen na sādhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1798: kiṃ sādhyam anyathā aniṣṭaṃ bhaved vaiphalyam eva vā
SA15dhkprvku:1800: etena kathite sādhyaṃ sāmānyena atha sammatam
SA15dhkprvku:1801: tad eva artha-antara-abhāvād deha-anāptau na sidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1802: vācyaṃ śūnyaṃ pralapatāṃ tad etaj jāḍya-cintitam
SA15dhkprvku:1803: tulyaṃ nāśe api cec śabda-ghaṭa-bhedena kalpane
SA15dhkprvku:1804: na siddhena vināśena tadvataḥ sādhanād dhvaneḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1805: tathā artha-antara-bhāve syāt tadvān kumbho apy anityatā
SA15dhkprvku:1806: viśiṣṭā dhvaninā anveti no cen na ayoga-vāraṇāt
SA15dhkprvku:1808: vyavacchedād ayoge tu na anyena ananvaya-āgamaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1809: sāmānyam eva tat sādhyaṃ na ca siddha-prasādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:1810: viśiṣṭaṃ dharmiṇā tac ca na niranvaya-doṣavat
SA15dhkprvku:1814: sādhyaṃ yatas tathā na iṣṭaṃ sādhyo dharmo atra kevalaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1816: sādhyaḥ syād ātmanā eva iṣṭa ity upāttā svayaṃ-śrutiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1818: tatra ekasya api doṣaḥ syād yadi hetu-pratijñayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1820: hetur viruddho aprakṛter no ced anyatra sā samā
SA15dhkprvku:1821: atha atra dharmī prakṛtas tatra śāstra-artha-bādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:1823: kaiścit prakaraṇair icchā bhavet sā gamyate ca taiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1824: balāt tava icchā iyam iti vyaktam īśvara-ceṣṭitam
SA15dhkprvku:1825: vadan na kārya-liṅgāṃ tāṃ vyabhicāreṇa bādhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1826: anāntarīyake ca arthe bādhite anyasya kā kṣatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1827: uktaṃ ca na āgama-apekṣam anumānaṃ sva-gocare
SA15dhkprvku:1828: siddhaṃ tena susiddhaṃ tan na tadā śāstram īkṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:1829: vāda-tyāgas tadā syāc cen na tadā anabhyupāyataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1830: upāyo hy abhyupāye ayam anaṅgaṃ sa tadā api san
SA15dhkprvku:1832: cikīrṣoḥ sa hi kālaḥ syāt tadā śāstreṇa bādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:1835: tatra api sādhya-dharmasya sambaddhasya eva bādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:1837: kena iyaṃ sarva-cintāsu śāstraṃ grāhyam iti sthitiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1838: kṛtā idānīm asiddhāntair grāhyo dhūmena na analaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1840: vilabdhā bata kena amī siddhānta-viṣam agrahāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1841: yadi sādhana ekatra sarvaṃ śāstraṃ nidarśane
SA15dhkprvku:1842: darśayet sādhanaṃ syād ity eṣā lokottarā sthitiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1843: asambaddhasya dharmasya kim asiddhau na sidhyati
SA15dhkprvku:1844: hetus tat-sādhanāya uktaḥ kiṃ duṣṭas tatra sidhyati
SA15dhkprvku:1845: dharmān anupanīya eva dṛṣṭānte dharmiṇo akhilān
SA15dhkprvku:1847: svabhāvaṃ kāraṇaṃ vā artho avyabhicāreṇa sādhayan
SA15dhkprvku:1849: prapadyamānaś ca anyas taṃ nāntarīyakam īpsitaiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1851: ukto anukto api ced hetur virodho vādino atra kim
SA15dhkprvku:1852: na hi tasya ukti-doṣeṇa sa jātaḥ śāstra-bādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:1853: bādhakasya abhidhānāc ced doṣo yadi vaden na saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1854: kiṃ na bādheta so akurvan na yuktaṃ kena duṣyati
SA15dhkprvku:1856: duṣyed vyartha-abhidhānena na atra tasya prasādhanāt
SA15dhkprvku:1857: yadi kiṃcit kvacic śāstre na yuktaṃ pratiṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1858: bruvāṇo yuktam apy anyad iti rājakula-sthitiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1859: sarvān arthān samīkṛtya vaktuṃ śakyaṃ na sādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:1864: asambandhe api bādhā cet syāt sarvaṃ sarva-bādhakam
SA15dhkprvku:1865: sambandhas tena tatra eva bādhanād asti ced asat
SA15dhkprvku:1867: nāntarīyakatā-sādhye sambandhaḥ sā iha na īkṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:1868: kevalaṃ śāstra-pīḍā iha doṣaḥ sā anyakṛte samā
SA15dhkprvku:1873: anīpsitam asādhyaṃ ced vādinā anyo apy anīpsitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1874: dharmo asādhyas tadā asādhyaṃ bādhamānaṃ virodhi kim
SA15dhkprvku:1876: śāstreṣv icchā-pravṛtty-artho yadi śaṅkā kuto anviyam
SA15dhkprvku:1877: so aniṣiddhaḥ pramāṇena gṛhṇan kena nivāryate
SA15dhkprvku:1878: niṣiddhaś cet pramāṇena vācā kena pravartyate
SA15dhkprvku:1879: pūrvam apy eṣa siddhāntaṃ sva-icchayā eva gṛhītavān
SA15dhkprvku:1880: kathaṃcid anyaṃ sa punar grahītuṃ labhate na kim
SA15dhkprvku:1881: dṛṣṭer vipratipattīnām atra akarṣīt svayaṃ śrutim
SA15dhkprvku:1888: svarūpeṇa eva nirdeśya iti anena eva tad gatam
SA15dhkprvku:1890: sādhyatvena eva nirdeśya iti idaṃ phala-vad bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1892: iha evaṃ na hy anukte api kiṃcit pakṣe virudhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1893: kuryāc ced dharmiṇaṃ sādhyaṃ tataḥ kiṃ tan na śakyate
SA15dhkprvku:1894: kasmād hetv-anvaya-abhāvān na ca doṣas tayor ayam
SA15dhkprvku:1907: iha anaṅgam iṣern niṣṭhā tena īpsita-pade punaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1909: avācakatvāc ca ayuktaṃ tena iṣṭaṃ svayam ātmanā
SA15dhkprvku:1910: anapekṣya akhilaṃ śāstraṃ tad abhīṣṭasya sādhyatā
SA15dhkprvku:1911: tena anabhīṣṭa-saṃsṛṣṭasya iṣṭasya api hi bādhane
SA15dhkprvku:1912: yathā sādhyam abādhātaḥ pakṣa-hetū na duṣyataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1913: aniṣiddhaḥ pramāṇābhyāṃ sa ca upagama iṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:1915: anumānasya bhedena sā bādhā uktā caturvidhā
SA15dhkprvku:1916: tatra abhyupāyaḥ kārya-aṅgaṃ svabhāva-aṅgaṃ jagat sthitiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1918: āptaḥ sva-vacanaṃ śāstraṃ ca evam uktaṃ samatvataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1919: yathā ātmano apramāṇatve vacanaṃ na pravartate
SA15dhkprvku:1920: śāstra-dṛṣṭe tathā na arthe vicāras tad anāśraye
SA15dhkprvku:1921: tat prastāva-āśrayatve hi śāstraṃ bādhakam ity amum
SA15dhkprvku:1922: vaktum arthaṃ sva-vācā asya sahoktiḥ sāmya-dṛṣṭaye
SA15dhkprvku:1923: udāharaṇam apy atra sadṛśaṃ tena varṇitam
SA15dhkprvku:1927: śāstriṇo apy atadālambe viruddha-uktau tu vastuni
SA15dhkprvku:1928: na bādhā pratibandhaḥ syāt tulya-kakṣyatayā dvayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1929: yathā sva-vāci tac ca asyā tadā sva-vacana-ātmakam
SA15dhkprvku:1930: tayoḥ pramāṇaṃ yasya asti tat syād anyasya bādhakam
SA15dhkprvku:1932: tulya-kakṣyā yathārthaṃ vā bādheta katham anyathā
SA15dhkprvku:1933: prāmāṇyam āgamānāṃ ca prāg eva vinivāritam
SA15dhkprvku:1937: anyathā atiprasaṅgaḥ syād vyarthatā vā pṛthak kṛteḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1940: bādhakaṃ yadi na icchet sa bādhakaṃ kiṃ punar bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1942: puruṣa-icchā kṛtā ca asya paripūrṇā pramāṇatā
SA15dhkprvku:1943: tasmāt prasiddheṣv artheṣu śāstra-tyāge api na kṣatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1944: parokṣeṣv āgama-aniṣṭau na cintā eva pravartate
SA15dhkprvku:1947: śāstraṃ yat siddhayā yuktyā sva-vācā ca na bādhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1948: dṛṣṭe adṛṣṭe api tad grāhyam iti cintā pravartate
SA15dhkprvku:1954: kṛtānām akṛtānāṃ vā yogyaṃ viśvaṃ svabhāvataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1958: sarvo asyām apratīte api tasmiṃs tat-siddhatā tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1959: asādhāraṇatā na syāt bādhā-hetor iha anyathā
SA15dhkprvku:1960: tan niṣedho anumānāt syāc śabda-arthe anakṣa-vṛttitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1961: asādhāraṇatā tatra hetūnāṃ yatra na anvayi
SA15dhkprvku:1962: sattvam ity abhyudāhāro hetor evaṃ phalo mataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1966: abhāvaṃ darśayaty evaṃ pratīter anumā tv ataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1967: athavā bruvato lokasya anumā abhāva ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:1970: bhinnasya atad-vaśād vṛttis tad icchājā iti sūcitam
SA15dhkprvku:1971: candratāṃ śaśino anicchan kāṃ pratītiṃ sa vāñchati
SA15dhkprvku:1972: iti taṃ praty adṛṣṭāntaṃ tad-asādhāraṇaṃ matam
SA15dhkprvku:1973: na udāharaṇam eva idam adhikṛtya idam ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:1974: lakṣaṇatvāt tathā avṛkṣo dhātrī ity uktau ca bādhanāt
SA15dhkprvku:1977: yadi tasya kvacit sidhyet siddhaṃ vastu-balena tat
SA15dhkprvku:1979: tasya vastuni siddhasya śaśiny apy anivāraṇam
SA15dhkprvku:1980: tad-vastv-abhāve śaśini vāraṇe api na duṣyati
SA15dhkprvku:1986: na ity anena uktam atra eṣāṃ pratiṣedho virudhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1987: naimittikyāḥ śruter artham arthaṃ vā pāramārthikam
SA15dhkprvku:1988: śabdānāṃ pratirundhāno na bādhyas tena varṇitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1994: prasiddhasya śrutau rūpaṃ yad eva pratibhāsate
SA15dhkprvku:1996: tad-artha-artha-uktir asya eva kṣepe adhyakṣeṇa bādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:1997: tad eva rūpaṃ tatra arthaḥ śeṣaṃ vyāvṛtti-lakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:1998: avastu-rūpaṃ sāmānyam atas tan na akṣa-gocaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2000: pratikṣepe apy abādhā iti śrāvaṇa-uktyā prakāśitam
SA15dhkprvku:2003: sarvatra vādino dharmo yaḥ sva-sādhyatayā īpsitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2004: tad dharmavati bādhā syān na anya-dharmeṇa dharmiṇi
SA15dhkprvku:2005: anyathā asya uparodhaḥ ko bādhite anyatra dharmiṇi
SA15dhkprvku:2006: gata-arthe lakṣaṇe na asmin sva-dharmi-vacanaṃ punaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2007: bādhāyāṃ dharmiṇo api syāt bādhā ity asya prasiddhaye
SA15dhkprvku:2009: anyathā evaṃvidho dharmaḥ sādhya ity abhidhānataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2010: tad bādhām eva manyeta sva-dharmi-vacanaṃ tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2011: nanv etad apy artha-siddhaṃ satyaṃ kecit tu dharmiṇaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2012: kevalasya uparodhe api doṣavat tām upāgatāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2013: yathā parair anutpādyā pūrva-rūpan na kha-ādikam
SA15dhkprvku:2014: sakṛc śabda-ādy-ahetutvād ity ukte prāha dūṣakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2015: tadvad vastu-svabhāvo asan dharmī vyoma-ādir ity api
SA15dhkprvku:2016: na evam iṣṭasya sādhyasya bādhā kvacana vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:2017: dvayasya api hi sādhyatve sādhya-dharma-uparodhi yat
SA15dhkprvku:2018: bādhanaṃ dharmiṇas tatra bādhā ity etena varṇitam
SA15dhkprvku:2019: tathā eva dharmiṇo apy atra sādhyatvāt kevalasya na
SA15dhkprvku:2020: yady evam atra bādhā syāt na anya-anutpādya-śaktikaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2022: virodhitā bhavet atra hetur aikāntiko yadi
SA15dhkprvku:2024: vyāvṛtteḥ saṃśayād eṣa śeṣavad bheda iṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:2025: svayam iṣṭo yato dharmaḥ sādhyas tasmāt tad-āśrayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2026: bādhyo na kevalo na anya-saṃśrayo vā iti sūcitam
SA15dhkprvku:2027: svayaṃ śrutyā anya-dharmāṇāṃ bādhā abādhā iti kathyate
SA15dhkprvku:2028: tathā sva-dharmiṇā anyasya dharmiṇo api iti kathyate
SA15dhkprvku:2032: tena ity uktam ato apakṣa-doṣo asiddha-āśraya-ādikam
SA15dhkprvku:2036: dravya-lakṣaṇa-yukto anyaḥ saṃyoge artho asti dṛṣṭi-bhāk
SA15dhkprvku:2038: iṣṭo hy avayavī kāryaṃ dṛṣṭyā adṛśyeṣv asambhavī
SA15dhkprvku:2040: gurutva-adhogatī syātāṃ yady asau syāt tulā-natiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2041: tan nirguṇa-kriyas tasmāt samavāyi na kāraṇam
SA15dhkprvku:2042: tata eva na dṛśyo asāv adṛṣṭeḥ kārya-rūpayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2044: ā sūkṣmād dravyam ālāyās tulyatvād aṃśu-pāta-vat
SA15dhkprvku:2045: dravya-antara-gurutvasya gatirn na ity aparo abravīt
SA15dhkprvku:2046: tasya krameṇa saṃyukte pāṃśu-rāśau sakṛd yute
SA15dhkprvku:2047: bhedaḥ syād gaurave tasmāt pṛthak saha ca tolite
SA15dhkprvku:2050: gurutvaṃ kāryam ālāya yadi na eva upalakṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:2051: ā sarṣapād gurutvaṃ tad durlakṣitam analpakam
SA15dhkprvku:2053: nanv adṛṣṭo aṃśu-vat so artho na ca tat-kāryam īkṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:2058: udāharaṇam apy anyad diśā gamyam yathoktayā
SA15dhkprvku:2060: tathā param pratinyastam sādhyaṃ na iṣṭaṃ tadā api tat
SA15dhkprvku:2062: tasmāt sādhya-śrutirn na iṣṭaṃ viśeṣam avalambate
SA15dhkprvku:2065: sarvasya ca aprasiddhatvāt kathaṃcit tena na kṣamaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2072: śāstreṇa alaṃ yathāyogaṃ loka eva pravartatām
SA15dhkprvku:2076: vyarthā vyāpti-phalā sā uktiḥ sāmarthyād gamyate tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2079: pakṣa-doṣaḥ para-apekṣo na iti ca pratipāditam
SA15dhkprvku:2080: iṣṭa-asambhavy-asiddhaś ca sa eva syāt nirākṛtaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2082: dṛṣṭānta-ākhyān ato anyat kim asty atra artha-anudarśanam
SA15dhkprvku:2084: na tad-vyāpteḥ phalaṃ vā kiṃ sāmānyena anuvartane
SA15dhkprvku:2085: syān nirākaraṇaṃ śabde sthitena eva ity ato abravīt
SA15dhkprvku:2086: viruddha-viṣaye anyasmin vadann āha anyatāṃ śruteḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2087: sā ca bheda-apratikṣepāt sāmānyānāṃ na vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:2088: vṛkṣo na śiṃśapā eva iti yathā prakaraṇe kvacit
SA15dhkprvku:2089: sarva-śruter eka-vṛttirn niṣedhaḥ syān na tāvatā
SA15dhkprvku:2093: sarvatra doṣas tulyaś cen na saṃvṛtyā viśeṣataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2099: dharmī dharmāś ca bhāsante vyavahāras tad-āśrayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2101: sādhyaḥ sādhanatāṃ nītas tena asiddhaḥ prakāśitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2104: pakṣa-aṅgatve apy abādhatvān na asiddhir bhinna-dharmiṇi
SA15dhkprvku:2105: yathā aśvo na viṣāṇitvād eṣa piṇḍo viṣāṇavān
SA15dhkprvku:2106: sādhya-kāla-aṅgatā vā na nivṛtter upalakṣya tat
SA15dhkprvku:2107: viśeṣo api pratijñā-artho dharma-bhedān na yujyate
SA15dhkprvku:2110: ayogaṃ yogam aparair atyantāyogam eva ca
SA15dhkprvku:2113: vivakṣāto prayoge api tasya artho ayaṃ pratīyate
SA15dhkprvku:2115: pārtho dhanurdharo nīlaṃ sarojam iti vā yathā
SA15dhkprvku:2122: na hi svabhāvād anyena vyāptir gamyasya kāraṇe
SA15dhkprvku:2124: prayatnānantaraṃ jñānaṃ prāk sato niyamena na
SA15dhkprvku:2128: etena eva prasiddho api svabhāvasya pṛthak kṛtiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2129: kāryeṇa saha nirdeśe mā jñāsīt sarvam īdṛśam
SA15dhkprvku:2131: prabheda-mātram ākhyātaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tu na bhidyate
SA15dhkprvku:2132: tena atra kārya-liṅgena svabhāvo apy ekadeśa-bhāk
SA15dhkprvku:2134: yan nāntarīyakā sattā yo vā ātmā svo avibhāgavān
SA15dhkprvku:2135: sa tena avyabhicārī syād ity arthaṃ tat prabhedanam
SA15dhkprvku:2136: saṃyogy-ādiṣu yeṣv asti pratibandho na tādṛśam
SA15dhkprvku:2137: na te hetava ity uktaṃ vyabhicārasya sambhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:2138: sati vā pratibandhes tu sa eva gati-sādhanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2139: niyamo hy avinābhāvo anityaś ca na sādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:2141: tac ca na apratibaddheṣu tata eva anvaya-sthitiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2142: svātmatve hetu-bhāve vā siddhe hi vyatirekitā
SA15dhkprvku:2143: sidhyaty ato viśeṣe na vyatireko na ca anvayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2145: uktā anaikāntikas tasmād anyathā gamako bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:2147: ātmano vinivarteta prāṇa-ādir yadi tac ca na
SA15dhkprvku:2149: tadātmā tat-prasūtaś cen na etad ātma-upalambhane
SA15dhkprvku:2150: tasya upalabdhāv agatāv agatau ca prasidhyati
SA15dhkprvku:2151: te ca atyantaparokṣasya dṛṣṭy-adṛṣṭī na sidhyataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2152: anyatra adṛṣṭa-rūpasya ghaṭa-ādau na iti vā kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2154: prāṇa-ādeś ca kvacid dṛṣṭyā sattva-asattvaṃ pratīyate
SA15dhkprvku:2155: tathā ātmā yadi dṛśyeta sattva-asattvaṃ pratīyate
SA15dhkprvku:2156: yasya hetor abhāvena ghaṭe prāṇo na dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:2157: dehe api yady asau na syād yukto dehena sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2158: bhinne api kiṃcit sādharmyād yadi tattvaṃ pratīyate
SA15dhkprvku:2159: prameyatvād ghaṭa-ādīnāṃ sātmatvaṃ kiṃ na mīyate
SA15dhkprvku:2160: aniṣṭaṃ cet pramāṇaṃ hi sarva-iṣṭīnāṃ nibandhanam
SA15dhkprvku:2161: bhāva-abhāva-vyavasthāṃ kaḥ kartuṃ tena vinā prabhuḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2167: na tasya vyabhicāritvād vyatireke api cet katham
SA15dhkprvku:2168: na asādhyād eva viśleṣas tasya nanv evam ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:2169: sādhye anuvṛtty-abhāvo arthāt tasya anyatra apy asau samaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2170: asādhyād eva viccheda iti sādhye astitā ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:2171: arthāpattyā ata eva uktam ekena dvaya-darśanam
SA15dhkprvku:2174: nivṛttirn na asataḥ sādhyād asādhyeṣv eva no tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2175: na iti sā eva nivṛttiḥ kiṃ nivṛtter asato matā
SA15dhkprvku:2176: nivṛtty-abhāvas tu vidhir vastu-bhāvo asato api san
SA15dhkprvku:2177: vastv-abhāvas tu na asti iti paśya bāndhya-vijṛmbhitam
SA15dhkprvku:2178: nivṛttir yadi tasmin na hetor vṛttiḥ kiṃ niṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:2179: sā api na pratiṣedho ayaṃ nivṛttiḥ kiṃ niṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:2180: vidhānaṃ pratiṣedhaṃ ca muktvā śābdo asti na aparaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2181: vyavahāraḥ sa ca asatsu na iti prāptā atra mūkatā
SA15dhkprvku:2182: satāṃ ca na niṣedho asti so asatsu ca na vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:2183: jagaty anena nyāyena nañ-arthaḥ pralayaṃ gataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2184: deśa-kāla-niṣedhaś ced yathā asti sa niṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:2185: na tathā na yathā so asti tathā api na niṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:2188: tābhyāṃ sa dharmī sambaddhaḥ khyāty-abhāve api tādṛśaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2189: śabda-pravṛtter asti iti so api iṣṭo vyavahāra-bhāk
SA15dhkprvku:2195: vidhāv ekasya tad-bhājām iva anyeṣām upekṣakam
SA15dhkprvku:2196: niṣedhe tad-viviktaṃ ca tad anyeṣām apekṣakam
SA15dhkprvku:2200: tat-phalo atat-phalaś ca artho bhinna ekas tatas tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2203: dṛṣṭiṃ bheda-āśrayais te api tasmād ajñāta-viplavāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2204: sattā-sādhana-vṛtteś ca sandigdhaḥ syād asan na saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2205: asattvaṃ ca abhyupagamād apramāṇān na yujyate
SA15dhkprvku:2209: dvairāśye saty adṛṣṭe api syād adṛṣṭeṣu saṃśayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2212: bhāve virodhasya adṛṣṭau kaḥ sandehaṃ nivartayet
SA15dhkprvku:2213: kvacid viniyamāt ko anyas tat-kārya-ātmatayā sa ca
SA15dhkprvku:2214: nairātmyād api tena asya sandigdhaṃ vinivartanam
SA15dhkprvku:2215: astu nāma tathā apy ātmā na anairātmyāt prasidhyati
SA15dhkprvku:2216: yena asau vyatirekasya na abhāvaṃ bhāvam icchati
SA15dhkprvku:2217: yathā na avyatireke api prāṇa-ādirn na sapakṣataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2218: sapakṣa-avyatirekī ced hetur hetur ato anvayī
SA15dhkprvku:2219: na anvayy avyatirekī ced anairātmyaṃ na sātmakam
SA15dhkprvku:2220: yan nāntarīyakaḥ svātmā yasya siddhaḥ pravṛttiṣu
SA15dhkprvku:2221: nivartakaḥ sa eva ataḥ pravṛttau ca pravartakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2223: kārye dṛṣṭir adṛṣṭiś ca kāryakāraṇatā hi te
SA15dhkprvku:2227: tair vinā bhavato anyasmāt tajjaṃ rūpaṃ kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:2229: sā cen na bhedikā prāptam eka-rūpam idaṃ jagat
SA15dhkprvku:2232: tat tasya ajananaṃ rūpam anyasya yadi sā eva sā
SA15dhkprvku:2233: na tasya ajananaṃ rūpaṃ tat tasyāḥ sambhavet katham
SA15dhkprvku:2235: tasmāt sva-dṛṣṭāv iva tad dṛṣṭe kārye api gamyate
SA15dhkprvku:2237: drava-śakter yataḥ kledaḥ sā tv ekā eva dvayor api
SA15dhkprvku:2238: bhinna-abhinnaḥ kim asya ātmā bhinno atha dravatā katham
SA15dhkprvku:2239: abhinnā ity ucyate buddhes tad-rūpāyā abhedataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2241: yena aṃśena adadhad dhūmaṃ tena aṃśena tathā gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2243: dhūmo atad-vyabhicāri iti siddhaṃ kāryaṃ tathā param
SA15dhkprvku:2245: anagniś ced adhūmo asau sadhūmaś cet sapāvakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2251: siddha-udāharaṇā ity ukta-anupalabdhiḥ pṛthag na tu
SA15dhkprvku:2252: tatra apy adṛśyāt puruṣāt prāṇa-āder anivartanāt
SA15dhkprvku:2255: vastuny api tu pūrvābhyāṃ paryudāso vidhānataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2256: tatra upalabhyeṣv astitvam upalabdher na ca aparam
SA15dhkprvku:2260: tathā anyā na upalabhyeṣu na astitā anupalambhanāt
SA15dhkprvku:2262: siddho hi vyavahāro ayaṃ dṛśya-adṛṣṭāv asann iti
SA15dhkprvku:2263: tasyāḥ siddhāv asandigdhau tat-kāryatve api dhī-dhvanī
SA15dhkprvku:2264: vidyamāne hi viṣaye mohād atra ananubruvan
SA15dhkprvku:2271: buddher upalabhe vā iti kalpikāyāḥ samudbhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2272: viśeṣo gamyate arthānāṃ viśiṣṭād eva vedanāt
SA15dhkprvku:2274: tasmāt svato dhiyor bheda-siddhis tābhyāṃ tad-arthayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2275: anyathā hy anavasthānād bhedaḥ sidhyen na kasyacit
SA15dhkprvku:2278: tasmād anupalambho ayaṃ svayaṃ pratyakṣato gataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2283: yathā aliṅgo anya-sattveṣu vikalpa-ādir na sidhyati
SA15dhkprvku:2284: aniścaya-phalā hy eṣā na alaṃ vyāvṛtti-sādhane
SA15dhkprvku:2285: ādyā adhikriyate hetor niścayena eva sādhane
SA15dhkprvku:2286: tasyāḥ svayaṃ prayogeṣu svarūpaṃ vā prayujyate
SA15dhkprvku:2292: nāśanaṃ janayitvā anyaṃ sa hetus tasya nāśanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2293: tam eva naśvaraṃ bhāvaṃ janayed yadi kiṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:2294: ātma-upakārakaḥ kaḥ syāt tasya siddha-ātmanaḥ sataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2295: na ātma-upakārakaḥ kaḥ syāt tena yaḥ samapekṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:2296: anapekṣaś ca kiṃ bhāvo atathābhūtaḥ kadācana
SA15dhkprvku:2297: yathā na kṣepa-bhāg iṣṭaḥ sa eva udbhūta-nāśakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2298: kṣaṇam apy anapekṣatve bhāvo bhāvasya na iti cet
SA15dhkprvku:2299: bhāvo hi sa tathābhūto abhāve bhāvas tathā katham
SA15dhkprvku:2305: prayāsyati payonidheḥ paya iva sva-dehe jarām
